GE07bhg4c18u:1: arjuna uvāca saṃnyāsasya mahābāho tattvam icchāmi veditum |
GE07bhg4c18u:16: ity ādiṣu ca phala-mātra-tyāgena karmānuṣṭhānam upadiṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c18u:17: na ca paraspara-viruddhaṃ sarvajñaḥ parama-kāruṇiko bhagavān upadiśet |
GE07bhg4c18u:19: karma-sannyāsasya tad-anuṣṭhānasya cāvirodha-prakāraṃ bubhutsur arjuna uvāca sannyāsasyeti
GE07bhg4c18u:22: keśī-nāmno mahato hayākṛteḥ daityasya yuddhe mukhaṃ vyādāya bhakṣayitum āgacchato atyantaṃ vyātte mukhe vāma-bāhuṃ praveśya tat-kṣaṇam eva vivṛddhena tenaiva bāhunā karkaṭikā-phalavat taṃ vidārya nisūditavān |
GE07bhg4c18u:24: sannyāsasya tyāgasya ca tattvaṃ pṛthag vivekena veditum icchāmi ||1||
GE07bhg4c18u:31: ity atra bhagavad-vākye mokṣa-kāṅkṣi-śabdena sannyāsina eva ucyante |
GE07bhg4c18u:32: anye vā yady anya eva te, tarhi - sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ tataḥ kuru yatātmavān iti (Gītā 12.11) tvad-uktānāṃ sarva-karma-phala-tyāgināṃ teṣāṃ sa tyāgaḥ kaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:33: sannyāsināṃ ca ko sa sannyāsa iti vivekato jijñāsur āha sannyāsasyeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:34: pṛthag iti yadi sannyāsa-tyāga-śabdau bhinnārthau tadā sannyāsasya tyāgasya ca tattvaṃ pṛthag veditum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c18u:35: yadi tv ekārthau tāv api tvan-mate anya-mate vā tayor aikyārtham arthād ekārthatvam iti
GE07bhg4c18u:37: he hṛṣīkeśeti mad-buddheḥ pravartakatvāt tvam eva
GE07bhg4c18u:39: keśi-nisūdana iti taṃ ca sandehaṃ tvam eva
GE07bhg4c18u:42: 'haṃ kiñcid bāhubalānvita ity etad aṃśenaiva mayā saha sakhyaṃ tava |
GE07bhg4c18u:43: na tu sārvajñyādibhir aṃśair atas tvad-datta-kiñcit-sakhya-bhāvād eva praśne mama niḥśaṅkateti bhāvaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c18u:46: bhaktes tatra prapatteś ca so 'bravīd atigopyatām ||
GE07bhg4c18u:48: (Gītā 5.13) ity ādau sannyāsa-śabdena kim uktam -- tyaktvā karma-phalāsaṅgaṃ (Gītā 4.20)
GE07bhg4c18u:49: ityādau tyāga-śabdena ca kim uktaṃ bhagavatā tatra sandihāno 'rjunaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:51: sannyāsa-tyāga-śabdau śaila-taru-śabdāv iva vijātīyārthau kiṃ vā kuru-pāṇḍava-śabdāv iva sajātīyārthau
GE07bhg4c18u:52: yady ādyas tarhi sannyāsasya tyāgasya ca tattvaṃ pṛthag-veditum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c18u:53: yadyantas tarhi tatrāvāntaropādhi-mātraṃ bhedakaṃ bhāvi, tac ca veditum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c18u:54: he mahābāho kṛṣṇa hṛṣīkeśeti dhī-vṛtti-prerakatvāt tvam eva mat-sandeham
GE07bhg4c18u:56: keśi-nisūdaneti tvaṃ mat-sandehaṃ keśinam iva vināśayeti
GE07bhg4c18u:58: śrībhagavān uvāca kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:60: Śrīdhara : tatrottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca - kāmyānām iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:62: putra-kāmo yajeta svarga-kāmo yajetety evam ādi kāmopabandhena vihitānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ parityāgaṃ sannyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:64: sarva-karmaṇām api nyāsaṃ sannyāsaṃ paṇḍitā vidur jānantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:65: sarveṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ nitya-naimittikānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phala-mātra-tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:66: prāhus tyāgaṃ prāhus tyāgaṃ vicakṣaṇā nipuṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:69: nanu nitya-naimittikānāṃ phalāśravaṇād avidyamānasya phalasya kathaṃ tyāgaḥ syāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:71: ucyate yadyapi svarga-kāmaḥ paśukāma ity ādivad aharahaḥ sandhyām upāsīta
GE07bhg4c18u:72: yāvaj-jīvam agnihotraṃ juhotīty ādiṣu phala-viśeṣo na śrūyate tathāpy
GE07bhg4c18u:73: apuruṣārthe vyāpāre prekṣāvantaṃ pravartayitum aśaknuvan vidhir viśvajitā yajetety ādiṣv iva sāmānyataḥ kim api phalam ākṣipaty eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:75: cātīva-gurum ataḥ śraddhayā sva-siddhir eva vidheḥ prayojanam iti mantavyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:77: śrūyate ca nityādiṣv api phalam - sarva ete puṇya-lokā bhavatīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:80: dharmeṇa pāpam apanudanti ity evam ādiṣu |
GE07bhg4c18u:83: nanu phala-tyāgena punar pai niṣphaleṣu karmasu pravṛttir eva na syāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:84: tan na, sarveṣām api karmaṇāṃ saṃyoga-pṛthaktvena vividiṣārthatayā viniyogāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:85: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakeneti
GE07bhg4c18u:86: tataś ca śruti-padoktaṃ sarvaṃ phalaṃ bandhakatvena tyaktvā vividiṣārthaṃ sarva-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ ghaṭata eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:89: tāvat paryantaṃ ca sattva-śuddhy-arthaṃ jñānāviruddhaṃ yathocitam avaśyakaṃ karma kurvatas tat-phala-tyāga eva karma-tyāgo nāma |
GE07bhg4c18u:91: tathā ca śrutiḥ kurvann eveha karmāṇi jijīviṣec chatāṃ samāḥ (Īśo 2) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:92: tataḥ parantu sarva-karma-nivṛttiḥ svata eva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:96: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā - yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c18u:98: na karmāṇi tyajed yogī karmabhis tyajyate hy asau |
GE07bhg4c18u:103: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā |
GE07bhg4c18u:104: mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate || (BhP 11.20.9)
GE07bhg4c18u:106: saliṅgānāśramāṃs tyaktvā cared avidhi-gocaraḥ || (BhP 11.18.28) ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c18u:108: Viśvanātha : prathamaṃ prācyaṃ matam āśritya sannyāsa-tyāga-śabdayor
GE07bhg4c18u:111: yajeta ity evaṃ kāmopabandhena vihitānāṃ kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ svarūpeṇaiva tyāgaṃ sannyāsaṃ vidur na tu nityānām api sandhyopāstādīnām iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:112: sarveṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ nityānām api karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ karmaṇā pitṛlokaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:113: dharmeṇa pāpam upanudati ity ādyāḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanty eva ity atas tyāge phalābhisandhi-rahitaṃ sarva-karma-karaṇam |
GE07bhg4c18u:115: kāmya-karmaṇāṃ tu svarūpeṇaiva tyāga iti bhedo jñeyaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c18u:116: Baladeva : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān uvāca kāmyānām iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:118: svarga-kāmo yajeta ity evaṃ kāmopanibandhena vihitānāṃ putreṣṭi-jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ svarūpeṇatyāgaṃ kavayaḥ paṇḍitāḥ sannyāsaṃ vidur na tu nityānām agnihotrādīnām ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:119: teṣu vicakṣaṇās tu sarveṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ nityānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phala-tyāgam eva, na tu svarūpatas tyāgaṃ sannyāsa-lakṣaṇaṃ tyāgaṃ prāhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:120: nitya-karmaṇāṃ ca phalam asti - karmaṇāṃ pitṛ-loko dharmeṇa pāpam apanudati ity ādi śravaṇāt
GE07bhg4c18u:121: | yadyapi aharahaḥ sandhyām upāsīta, yāvaj-jīvanam agnihotraṃ juhoti ity
GE07bhg4c18u:122: ādau, putra-kāmo yajeta ity ādāv iva phala-viśeṣo na śrutayas tathāpi
GE07bhg4c18u:123: viśvajitā yajeta ity ādāv iva vidhiḥ kiñcit phalam ākṣiped eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:127: svarūpatas tyāgo, nitya-karmaṇāṃ tu phala-tyāgaḥ sannyāsa-śabdārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:128: sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalecchāṃ tyaktvānuṣṭhānaṃ khalu tyāga-śabdārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:132: tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:140: hetoḥ sarveṣām api karma tyājyam iti eke sāṅkhyāḥ prāhur manīṣiṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:141: asyāyaṃ bhāvaḥ - mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtānīti niṣedhaḥ puruṣasyānartha-hetur
GE07bhg4c18u:143: agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhetety ādi-prākaraṇiko vidhis tu hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvam āha |
GE07bhg4c18u:146: dravya-sādhyeṣu ca sarveṣv api karmasu hiṃsādeḥ sambhavāt sarvam api karma tyājyam eveti |
GE07bhg4c18u:147: tad uktaṃ - dṛṣṭavad ānuśravikaḥ sa hy aviśuddhi-kṣayātiśaya-yukta iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:148: asyārthaḥ guru-pāṭhād anuśrūyata iti anuśravo vedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:154: apare tu mīmāṃsakā yajñādikaṃ karma na tyājyam iti prāhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:155: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ kratv-arthāpi satīyaṃ hiṃsā puruṣeṇa kartavyā |
GE07bhg4c18u:156: sā cānyoddeśenāpi kṛtā puruṣasya pratyavāya-hetur eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:160: na tv evaṃ niṣedho niṣedhasya tādarthyam apekṣate prāpti-mātrāpekṣitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:162: tad evaṃ samāna-viṣayakatvena sāmānya-śāstrasya viśeṣeṇa bādhān nāsti doṣavattvam |
GE07bhg4c18u:163: ato nityaṃ yajñādi-karma na tyājyam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:166: Viśvanātha : tyāge punar api mata-bhedam upakṣipati tyājyam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:168: hiṃsādi-doṣavattvāt karma svarūpata eva tyājyām ity eke sāṅkhyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:169: pare mīmāṃsakā yajñādikaṃ karma śāstre vihitatvān na tyājyam ity āhuḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c18u:170: Baladeva : tyāge punar api mata-bhedam āha tyājyam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:171: eke manīṣiṇo doṣavat na hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtānīti śruti-nidarśinaḥ kāpilāḥ karma-doṣavat
GE07bhg4c18u:172: paśu-hiṃsādi-doṣa-yuktaṃ bhavaty atas tyājyaṃ svarūpato heyam ity āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:173: agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabheteti śrutis tu hiṃsāyāḥ kratv-aṅgatvam āha tv anartha-hetutvaṃ tasyā nivārayati |
GE07bhg4c18u:176: apare jaiminīyās tu yajñādikarma na tyājyaṃ tasya veda-vihitatvena nirdoṣatvād ity āhuḥ - yadyapi hiṃsānugrahātmakaṃ karma tathāpi tasya vedena dharmatvābhidhānān na doṣavattvam ataḥ kāryam evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:177: na hiṃsyāt iti sāmānyato niṣedhas tu krator anyatra tasyāḥ pāpatām āheti na kiñcid avadyam
GE07bhg4c18u:179: niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama |
GE07bhg4c18u:181: Śrīdhara : evaṃ mata-bhedam upanyasya svamataṃ kathayitum āha niścayam iti
GE07bhg4c18u:182: | tatraivaṃ vipratipanne tyāge niścayaṃ ye vacanāt śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c18u:184: loka-prasiddhatvāt kim atra śrotavym iti māvamaṃsthā ity āha he puruṣa-vyāghra puruṣa-śreṣṭha
GE07bhg4c18u:189: traividhyaṃ ca niyatasya tu sannyāsaḥ karmaṇa ity ādinā vakṣyati ||4||
GE07bhg4c18u:192: atra tyāgasya traividhyam uktramya niyatasya tu sannyāsaḥ karmaṇo nopapadyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:193: mohāt tasya parityāgas tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ || iti tasya eva tāmasa-bhedaiḥ sannyāsa-śabda-prayogād
GE07bhg4c18u:195: Baladeva : evaṃ mata-bhedam upavarṇya svamatam āha niścayam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:196: mata-bheda-graste tyāge me parameśvarasya sarvajñasya niścayaṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c18u:197: nanu tyāgasya khyātatvāt tatra śrotavyaṃ kim asti |
GE07bhg4c18u:199: hi yatas tyāgas tāmasādi-bhedena vijñais trividhaḥ samprakīrtito vivicyoktaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:200: | tathā ca durbodho 'sau śrotavya iti tyāga-traividhyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:201: niyatasya tu ity ādibhir agre vācyam ||4||
GE07bhg4c18u:203: yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat |
GE07bhg4c18u:204: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām ||5||
GE07bhg4c18u:205: Śrīdhara : prathamaṃ tāvan niścayam āha yajñeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c18u:207: Viśvanātha : kāmyānām api madhye bhagavan-mate sāttvikāni
GE07bhg4c18u:210: tatra hetuḥ pāvanānīti citta-śuddhikaratvād ity arthaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c18u:211: Baladeva : prathamaṃ tasmin svaniścayam āha yajñeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c18u:212: yajñādīni manīṣiṇāṃ kāryāṇy eva na tyājyāni yad amūni viṣa-tantuvad
GE07bhg4c18u:215: etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:216: kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam ||6||
GE07bhg4c18u:217: Śrīdhara : yena prakāreṇa kṛtāny etāni pāvanāni bhavanti taṃ prakāraṃ darśayann āha etānīti
GE07bhg4c18u:218: yāni yajñādīni karmāṇi mayā pāvanānīty uktam etāny apy eva kartavyāni |
GE07bhg4c18u:219: katham? saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhantayā kartavyānīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:220: phalāni ca tyaktvā kartavyāni iti ca me mataṃ niścitam |
GE07bhg4c18u:222: Viśvanātha : yena prakāreṇa kṛtāny etāni pāvanāni bhavanti taṃ prakāraṃ darśayati etāny apīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:224: phalābhisandhi-kartṛtvābhiniveśayos tyāga eva tyāgaḥ sannyāsaś cocyata ity
GE07bhg4c18u:226: Baladeva : yajñādīnāṃ pāvanatā-prakāram āha etāny apīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:227: saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ phalāni ca pratipaoktāni pitṛ-lokādīni ca sarvāṇi tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārcana-dhiyā kartavyānīti me mayā niścitam ata uttamam idaṃ matam |
GE07bhg4c18u:233: Śrīdhara : pratijñātaṃ tyāgasya traividhyam idānīṃ darśayati niyatasyeti
GE07bhg4c18u:236: niyatasya tu nityasya punaḥ karmaṇaḥ sannyāsas tyāgo nopapadyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:239: atas tasya parityāga upādeyatve 'pi tyājyam ity evaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:241: sa ca mohasya tāmasatvāt tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:242: Viśvanātha : prakrāntasya trividha-tyāgasya tāmasaṃ bhedam āha niyatasya nityasya |
GE07bhg4c18u:245: āvaśyakatvābhāvāt parityajatu nāma, nityasya tu karmaṇas tyāgo nopapadyate iti tu śabdārthaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:250: Baladeva : pratijñātaṃ tyāga-traividhyam āha niyatasyeti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:254: ātmoddeśād viśīrṇādivad antargata-jñānasya tasya mocakatvād dehayātrā-sādhakatvāc ca
GE07bhg4c18u:258: vaiparītye pūrvam abhihitaṃ nityataṃ kuru karma tvam ity ādibhis tṛtīyae tasyāpi mohād bandhakam idam ity ajñānāt paritaḥ svarūpeṇa tyāgas tāmaso bhavati -
GE07bhg4c18u:261: duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet |
GE07bhg4c18u:262: sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet ||8||
GE07bhg4c18u:263: Śrīdhara : rājasaṃ tyāgam āha duḥkham iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:264: yaḥ kartā ātma-bodhaṃ vinā kevalaṃ duḥkham ity evaṃ matvā śarīrāyāsa-bhayāt nityaṃ karma tyajet iti yat tādṛśas tyāgo rājaso duḥkhasya rājasatvāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:265: atas taṃ rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ kṛtvā sa rājasaḥ puruṣas tyāgasya phalaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇaṃ naiva labhata ity arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c18u:267: yadyapi nitya-karmaṇām āvaśyakam eva tat-karaṇe guṇa eva na tu doṣa iti jānāmy eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:268: tad apii taiḥ śarīraṃ mayā kathaṃ vṛthā kleśayitavyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:270: Baladeva : niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitaṃ vihitaṃ karma muktihetur iti jānann api
GE07bhg4c18u:271: dravopyārjana-prātaḥ-snānādinā duḥkha-rūpam iti kāya-kleśa-bhayāc caitan mumukṣur api tyajet
GE07bhg4c18u:273: taṃ tyāgaṃ kṛtvāpi janas tasya phalaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ na labheta ||8||
GE07bhg4c18u:275: kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyaterjuna |
GE07bhg4c18u:276: saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c18u:277: Śrīdhara : sāttvikaṃ tyāgam āha kāryam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:279: avaśya-kartavyatayā vihitaṃ karma saṅgaṃ phalaṃ ca tyaktvā kriyate iti yat
GE07bhg4c18u:281: Viśvanātha : kāryam avaśya-kartavyam iti buddhyā niyataṃ nityaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c18u:282: sāttvika iti tyāgāt tyāga-phalaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhetaiveti bhāvaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c18u:283: Baladeva : kāryam avaśya-kartavyatayā vihitaṃ karma niyataṃ yathā bhavati,
GE07bhg4c18u:284: tathā saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ phalaṃ ca nikhilaṃ tyaktvā kriyata iti yat sa tyāgaḥ sāttvikas tādṛśa-jñānasya sattva-dharmatvāt ||9||
GE07bhg4c18u:286: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate |
GE07bhg4c18u:291: akuśalaṃ duḥkhāvahaṃ śiśire prātaḥ-snānādikaṃ karma na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c18u:292: kuśale ca sukha-kare karmaṇi nidāghe madhyāhna-snānādau nānuṣajjate prītiṃ na karoti
GE07bhg4c18u:294: yatra para-paribhavādi mahad api duḥkhaṃ sahate svargādi-sukhaṃ ca tyajati tatra kiyad etat tātkālikaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:295: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca ity evam anusandhānavān ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:300: akuśalaṃ asukhadaṃ śīte prātaḥ-snānādikaṃ na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c18u:306: yataḥ sattva-samāviṣṭo 'tidhāro medhāvī sthiradhīś chinno vihitāni karmāṇi kleśānuṣṭhitāni jñānaṃ janayeyur na vety evaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:307: lakṣaṇaḥ saṃśayo yena saḥ || īdṛśaḥ sāttvika-tyāgī bodhyaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c18u:309: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:310: yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate ||11||
GE07bhg4c18u:311: Śrīdhara : nanv evambhutāt karma-phala-tyāgād varaṃ sarva-karma-tyāgaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:312: tathā sati karma-vikṣepābhāvena jñāna-niṣṭhā sukhaṃ sampadyate tatrāha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:313: deha-bhṛtā dehātmābhimānavatā niḥśeṣeṇa sarvāṇi karmāṇi tyaktuṃ na
GE07bhg4c18u:315: tad uktaṃ na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarma-kṛd ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c18u:316: tasmād yas tu karmāṇi kurvann api karma-phala-tyāgī sa eva mukhas
GE07bhg4c18u:318: Viśvanātha : ito 'pi śāstrīyaṃ karma na tyājyam ity āha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:320: tad uktaṃ na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty
GE07bhg4c18u:322: Baladeva : nanv īdṛśāt phala-tyāgāt svarūpataḥ karma-tyāgo varīyān vikṣepābhāvena jñāna-niṣṭhā sādhakatvād iti cet tatrāha na hīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:323: deha-bhṛtā karmāṇy aśeṣatas tyaktuṃ na hi śakyaṃ na śakyāni |
GE07bhg4c18u:324: yad uktaṃ na hi kaścit kṣaṇam apītyādi |
GE07bhg4c18u:325: tasmād yaḥ karmāṇi kurvann eva tat-phala-tyāgo, sa eva tyāgīty ucyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:330: aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam |
GE07bhg4c18u:331: bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kvacit ||12||
GE07bhg4c18u:332: Śrīdhara : evambhūtasya karma-phala-tyāgasya phalam āha aniṣṭam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:336: evaṃ trividhaṃ pāpasya puṇyasya cobhaya-miśrasya ca karmaṇo yat phalaṃ prasiddham |
GE07bhg4c18u:337: tat sarvam atyāgināṃ sakāmānām eva pretya paratra bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:340: na tu sannyāsināṃ kvacid api bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:343: anāśritaḥ karma-phalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:344: sa sannyāsī ca yogī cety evam ādau ca karma-phala-tyāgiṣu sannyāsi-śabda-yoga-darśanāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:345: teṣāṃ sāttvikānāṃ pāpāsambhavād īśvarārpaṇena ca puṇya-phalasya tyaktatvāt trividham api karma-phalaṃ na bhavatīty arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c18u:346: Viśvanātha : evambhūta-tyāgābhāve doṣam āha - aniṣṭaṃ naraka-duḥkhaṃ iṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:349: Baladeva : īdṛśa-tyāgābhāve doṣam āha aniṣṭam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:356: teṣāṃ tu karmāntargatena jñānena mokṣo bhavatīti tyāga-phalam uktam ||12||
GE07bhg4c18u:360: Śrīdhara : nanu karma kurvataḥ karma-phalaṃ kathaṃ na bhaved ity āśaṅkya saṅga-tyāgino nirahaṅkārasya sataḥ karma-phalena lepo nāstīty upapādayitum
GE07bhg4c18u:363: vakṣyamāṇāni pañca-kāraṇāni me vacanān nibodha jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c18u:371: tasmin kṛtaṃ karma tasyāntaḥ samāptir asminn iti sāṅkhyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:376: Viśvanātha : nanu karmakurvataḥ karma-phalaṃ kathaṃ na bhaved ity āśaṅkya nirahaṅkāratve sati karma-lepo nāstīty upapādayitum āha pañcamānīti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:377: sarva-karmaṇāṃ siddhaye niṣpattaya imāni pañca-kāraṇāni me mama vacanān nibodha jānīhi |
GE07bhg4c18u:378: samyak paramātmānaṃ khyāti kathayati iti saṅkhyam eva sāṅkhyaṃ vedānta-śāstraṃ tasmin |
GE07bhg4c18u:379: kīdṛśe kṛtaṃ karma tasyānto nāśo yasmāt tasmin proktāni |
GE07bhg4c18u:380: Baladeva : nanu karmāṇi kurvatāṃ tat-phalāni kuto na syur iti cet svasmin
GE07bhg4c18u:381: kartṛtvābhiniveśa-tyāgena parameśvare mukha-kartṛtva-niścayena bhavatīty āśayenāha pañcaitānīti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:382: he mahābāho sarva-karmaṇāṃ siddhaye niṣpattaye etāni pañca-kāraṇāni me matto nibodha jānīhi
GE07bhg4c18u:384: sāṅkhyaṃ jñānaṃ tat-pratipādakaṃ vedānta-śāstram sāṅkhyaṃ tasmin |
GE07bhg4c18u:385: kīdṛśīty āha kṛtānte kṛta-nirṇaye sarveṣāṃ karma-hetūnāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:389: ihāpi sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi (Gītā 15.15) ity ādy uktaṃ |
GE07bhg4c18u:390: vakṣyate ca īśvaraḥ sarva-bhūtānām (Gītā 18.61) ity ādi ||
GE07bhg4c18u:392: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham |
GE07bhg4c18u:393: vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam ||14||
GE07bhg4c18u:416: adhiṣṭhīyate jīvenety adhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīraṃ kartā jīvaḥ asya jñātṛtva-kartṛtve śrutir āha eṣa hi draṣṭā sraṣṭā
GE07bhg4c18u:418: sūtrakāraś ca jño 'ta eva (Vs 2.3.18) iti kartā śāstrārthavattvāt (Vs 2.3.26) ity ādi ca
GE07bhg4c18u:424: karma-niṣpādake hetu-pracaye daivaṃ sarvārādhyaṃ paraṃ brahma pañcamam |
GE07bhg4c18u:425: karma-niṣpattāv antaryāmī harir mukhyo hetur ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:429: nanu jīvasya kartṛtve pareśāyatte sati tasya karma sva-niyojyatvāpattiḥ,
GE07bhg4c18u:432: svadhiyā pravartituṃ na śakto niyojyo dṛṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:433: ucyate -- pareśena dattair dehendriyādibhis tenaivāhita-śaktibhis tad-ādhāra-bhūto jīvas
GE07bhg4c18u:436: pareśas tu tat-sarvāntaḥ-sthas tasminn anumatiṃ dadānas taṃ prerayatīti jīvasya
GE07bhg4c18u:437: sva-dhiyā pravṛtti-nivṛttimattvam astīti na kiñcic codyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:438: evam eva sūtrakāro niṛṇītavān parāt tat tac chakteḥ (? parāt tac-chruteḥ, 2.3.40)
GE07bhg4c18u:440: nanu muktasya jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ na syāt, tasya
GE07bhg4c18u:441: dehendriya-prāṇānāṃ vigamād iti cen na, tadā saṅkalpa-siddhānāṃ divyānāṃ teṣāṃ sattvāt ||14||
GE07bhg4c18u:444: nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c18u:445: Śrīdhara: eteṣām eva sarva-karma-hetutvam āha śarīreti |
GE07bhg4c18u:446: yathoktaiḥ pañcabhiḥ prārabhyamānaṃ karma triṣv evāntarbhāvyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:448: ity uktaṃ śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca trividhaṃ karmeti prasiddheḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:449: śarīrādibhiḥ yat karma dharmyam adharmyaṃ vā karoti naras tasya karmaṇa ete pañca hetavaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:450: Viśvanātha : śarīrādibhir iti śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ceti karma trividham |
GE07bhg4c18u:454: Baladeva : śarīreti -- nyāyyaṃ śāstrīyam, viparītam aśāstrīyam || 15 ||
GE07bhg4c18u:456: tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:457: paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c18u:458: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ ? ata āha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c18u:459: tatra sarvasmin karmaṇi ete pañca hetava iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:460: evaṃ sati kevalaṃ nirupādhim asaṅgam ātmānaṃ tu yaḥ kartāraṃ paśyati śāstrācāryopadeśābhyām asaṃskṛta-buddhitvād durmatir asau samyak
GE07bhg4c18u:462: Viśvanātha : tataḥ kiṃ ? ata āha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c18u:463: tatra sarvasmin karmaṇi ete pañcaiva hetava ity evaṃ sati kevalaṃ vastutaḥ niḥsaṅgam evātmānaṃ jīvaṃ yaḥ kartāraṃ paśyati, so 'haṅkṛta-buddhitvād asaṃskṛta-buddhitvād durmatir naiva paśyati so 'jñānī anda evocyata iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:464: Baladeva : tataḥ kiṃ ? ata āha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c18u:466: evaṃ sati jīvasya kartṛtve pareśānumati-pūrvake tad-datta-dehādi-sāpekṣe ca sati, tatra karmaṇi kevalam evātmānaṃ jīvam eva yaḥ kartāraṃ paśyati |
GE07bhg4c18u:467: sa durmatir akṛta-buddhitvād alabdha-jñānatvān na paśyati yathāndhaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:469: yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:470: hatvā.api sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate ||17||
GE07bhg4c18u:471: Śrīdhara: kas tarhi sumatir yasya karma-lepo nāstīty uktam ity apekṣāyām āha - yasyeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:472: aham iti kṛto 'haṃ kartā ity evambhūto bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:476: ataeva yasya buddhir na lipyate iṣṭāniṣṭa-buddhyā karmasu na sajjate |
GE07bhg4c18u:477: na evambhūto dehādi-vyatiriktātma-darśī imān lokān sarvān api prāṇino loka-dṛṣṭyā
GE07bhg4c18u:478: hatvāpi viviktatayā sva-dṛṣṭyā na hanti, na tat-phalair nibadhyate bandhaṃ na prāpnoti
GE07bhg4c18u:481: tad uktaṃ - brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:484: Viśvanātha : kas tarhi sumatiś cakṣuṣmān ity ata āha yasyeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:485: ahaṅkṛto ahaṅkārasya bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ kartṛtvābhiniveśo yasya nāsti ataeva yasya buddhir na lipyate iṣṭāniṣṭa-buddhyā karmasu nāsajjati, sa hi karma-phalaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:487: sa hi karma bhadrābhadraṃ kurvann api naiva karotīty āha hatvāpīti, sa imān sarvān api prāṇino loka-dṛṣṭyā hatvāpi
GE07bhg4c18u:492: Baladeva : kas tarhi cakṣuṣmān sumatis tatrāha yasyeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:493: yasya puruṣasya manovṛtti-lakṣaṇo bhāvo nāhaṅkṛtaḥ sva-kartṛtve pareśāyatte 'nusandhite
GE07bhg4c18u:494: sati karmāṇy aham eva karomīty abhimāna-kṛto na bhavet |
GE07bhg4c18u:495: yasya ca buddhir na lipyate karma-phala-spṛhayā, sa imāṅl lokān na kevalaṃ bhīṣmādīn
GE07bhg4c18u:496: hatvāpi na hanti, na ca tena sarva-loka-hananena karmaṇā nibadhyate lipyate || 17 ||
GE07bhg4c18u:500: Śrīdhara: hatvāpi na hanti na nibadhyate ity etad evopapādayituṃ karma-codanāyāḥ karmāśrayasya ca karma-phalādīnāṃ ca triguṇātmakatvān nirguṇasyātmanas tat-sambandho nāstīty abhiprāyeṇa karma-codanāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:509: tad uktaṃ bhaṭṭaiḥ - codanā copadeśaś ca vidhiś caikārtha-vācina iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:511: tataś cāyam arthaḥ ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ jñānādi-trayam
GE07bhg4c18u:521: sampradānādi kāraka-trayaṃ tu parasparayā kriyā-pravartakam eva kevalam |
GE07bhg4c18u:523: ataḥ karaṇādi-trayam eva kriyāśraya ity uktam ||
GE07bhg4c18u:524: Viśvanātha : tad evaṃ bhagavan-mata ukta-lakṣaṇaḥ sāttvikas tyāga eva
GE07bhg4c18u:525: sannyāso jñāninām, bhaktānāṃ tu karma-yogasya svarūpeṇaiva tyāgo 'vagamyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:526: yad uktam ekādaśe bhagavataiva ājñāyaiva guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān |
GE07bhg4c18u:527: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ || (BhP 11.11.37) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:528: asyārthaḥ svāmi-caraṇair vyākhyāto yathā - mayā veda-rūpeṇādiṣṭān api svadharmān santyajya yo māṃ bhajet sa ca sattama iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:529: kim ajñānato nāstikyād vā ? na dharmācaraṇe sattva-śuddhyādīn guṇān vipakṣe doṣān
GE07bhg4c18u:530: pratyavāyāṃś cājñāya jñātvāpi mad-dhyāna-vikṣepatayā mad-bhaktyaiva sarvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti dṛḍha-niścayenaiva dharmān santyajya ity
GE07bhg4c18u:531: atra dharmān dharma-phalāni santyajyeti tu vyākhyā na ghaṭate |
GE07bhg4c18u:532: na hi dharma-phala-tyāge kaścid atra pratyavāyo bhaved ity avadheyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:533: ayaṃ bhāvo bhagavad-vākyānāṃ tad-vyākhyātṝṇāṃ ca - jñānaṃ hi citta-śuddhim
GE07bhg4c18u:534: avaśyam evāpekṣate, niṣkāma-karmabhiś citta-śuddhi-tāratamye vṛtte eva jñānodaya-tāratamyaṃ bhaven nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c18u:535: ataeva samyag jñānodaya-siddhy-arthaṃ sannyāsibhir api niṣkāma-karma na kartavyam eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:537: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:538: yogārūḍhasya tasaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate || (Gītā 6.2) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:539: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ātma-tṛptaś ca mānavaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:540: ātmany eva ca santuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate || (Gītā 3.17) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:541: bhaktis tu paramā svatantrā mahā-prabalā citta-śuddhiṃ naivāpekṣate, yad uktam -
GE07bhg4c18u:543: śraddhānvito yaḥ śṛṇuyād ity ādau bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati parilabhya kāmaṃ hṛd-rogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ || (BhP 10.33.42) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:544: atra tv ātma-pratyayeṇa hṛd-rogavattve vādhikāriṇi paramāyā bhakter api prathamam eva praveśas tatas tatraiva kāmādīnām apagamaś ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:548: dhunoti śamalaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ salilasya yathā śarat || (BhP 2.8.5)
GE07bhg4c18u:549: iti ca ity ato bhaktyaiva yadi tādṛśī citta-śuddhiḥ syāt, tadā bhaktaiḥ kathaṃ karma kartavyam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:550: atha prakṛam anusarāmaḥ - kiṃ ca na kevalaṃ dehādi-vyātiriktasyātmanaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:551: jñānam eva jñānam, tathātma-tattvam api jñeyam, tādṛśa-jñānāśraya eva
GE07bhg4c18u:552: jñānī, kintv etat trike karma-sambandho vartate |
GE07bhg4c18u:553: tad api sannyāsibhir jñeyam ity āha jñānam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:554: atra codanā śabdena vidhir ucyate, yad uktaṃ bhaṭṭaiḥ - codanā copadeśaś ca vidhiś caikārtha-vācina iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:555: uktaṃ ślokārdhaṃ svayam eva vyācaṣṭe karaṇam iti yaj jñānaṃ tat karaṇa-kārakam |
GE07bhg4c18u:557: yaj jñeyaṃ jīvātma-tattvaṃ, tad eva karma-kārakam |
GE07bhg4c18u:558: yas tasya parijñātā sa kartā iti trividhaḥ karaṇaṃ karma kartā iti trividhaṃ kārakam ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:559: karma-saṅgrahaḥ karmaṇā niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhānenaiva saṅgṛhyata iti karma-codanā pada-vyākhyā
GE07bhg4c18u:560: jñānatvaṃ jñeyatvaṃ jñātṛtvaṃ caitat trayaṃ niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhāna-mūlakam iti bhāvaḥ ||18-19||
GE07bhg4c18u:562: tac ca saniṣṭhena karmaṭhena bodhyam iti upadiśati jñānam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:563: jñānaṃ jñeyam parijñātety evaṃ trika-yuktā karma-codanā jyotiṣṭomādi-karma-vidhiḥ codanā copadeśaś ca vidhiś caikārtha-vācina ity abhiyuktokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:564: tat trikaṃ svayam eva vyākhyāti karaṇam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:565: yaj jñānaṃ tat karaṇaṃ jñāyate 'nena iti nirukteḥ karaṇa-kārakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:568: yas tu tasya parito 'nuṣṭhānena jñātā, sa karteti kartṛ-kārakam |
GE07bhg4c18u:572: jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:573: procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api ||19||
GE07bhg4c18u:574: Śrīdharaḥ - tataḥ kiṃ ? ata āha jñānam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:577: tasmin jñānaṃ ca karma ca kartā ca pratyekaṃ sattvādi-guṇa-bhedena tridhaivocyate
GE07bhg4c18u:578: | tāny api jñānādīni vakṣyamāṇāni yathāvat śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c18u:581: caturdeśe 'dhyāye tatra sattvaṃ nirmalatvād ity ādinā guṇānāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:585: parityajya sāttvikāhārādi-sevayā sāttvikaḥ svabhāvaḥ sampādanīya ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c18u:586: iha tu kriyā-kāraka-phalādīnām ātma-sambandho nāstīti darśayituṃ sarveṣāṃ triguṇātmakatvam ucyate iti viśeṣo jñātavyaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c18u:587: Baladevaḥ - jñānam iti guṇa-saṅkhyāne guṇa-nirūpake śāstre caturdaśe tatra
GE07bhg4c18u:588: sattvaṃ nirmalatvād ity ādinā guṇānāṃ bandhakatā-prakāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:589: saptadaśe yajante sāttvikā devān ity ādinā guṇa-kṛta-svabhāva-bhedaś coktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:590: iha tu guṇa-saṃjñānāṃ jñānādīnāṃ traividhyam ucyata iti bodhyam ||19||
GE07bhg4c18u:593: avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam ||20||
GE07bhg4c18u:594: Śrīdharaḥ - tatra jñānasya sāttvikādi-traividhyam āha sarva-bhūteṣv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:595: sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmādi-sthāvarās teṣu vibhakteṣu parasparaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:596: vyavṛtteṣv avibhaktam anusyutam ekam avyayaṃ nirvikāraṃ bhāvaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:597: paramātma-tattvaṃ yena jñānenekṣata ālocayati taj jñānaṃ sāttvikaṃ viddhi
GE07bhg4c18u:598: Viśvanāthaḥ - sāttvikaṃ jñānam āha -- sarva-bhūteṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:599: ekaṃ bhāvam ekam eva jīvātmānaṃ nānā-vidha-phala-bhogārthaṃ krameṇa sarva-bhūteṣu
GE07bhg4c18u:600: manuṣya-deva-tiryag-ādiṣu vartamānam avyayaṃ naśvareṣv api teṣv anaśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:601: vibhakteṣu parasparaṃ vibhinneṣv apy avibhaktam eka-rūpaṃ yena
GE07bhg4c18u:607: avyayaṃ naśvareṣu teṣv anaśvaraṃ vibhakteṣu mitho-bhinneṣu teṣv avibhaktam eka-rūpaṃ ca yena taṃ vīkṣyate taj jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:610: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān |
GE07bhg4c18u:611: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam ||21||
GE07bhg4c18u:613: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānam ity asyaiva vivaraṇam |
GE07bhg4c18u:614: sarveṣu bhūteṣu nānā-bhāvān vastuta evānekān kṣetrajñān pṛthag-vidhān sukhitva-duḥkhitvādi-rūpeṇa vilakṣaṇān yena jñānena vetti taj jñānaṃ rājasaṃ viddhi ||21||
GE07bhg4c18u:615: Viśvanātha : rājasaṃ jñānam āha sarva-bhūteṣu jīvātmanaḥ pṛthaktvena yaj
GE07bhg4c18u:617: deha-nāśa evātmano nāśa ity asurāṇāṃ matam |
GE07bhg4c18u:618: ataeva pṛthak pṛthag deheṣu pṛthak pṛthag evātmeti tathā śāstra-karaṇāt pṛthag-vidhān
GE07bhg4c18u:621: sukha-duḥkhādyanāśraya itii jaḍa iti cetana iti vyāpaka iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:624: aneka iti ityādi kalpān yena eka ityādi veda tad rājasam ||21||
GE07bhg4c18u:626: sarveṣu bhūteṣu deva-manuṣyādi-deheṣu jīvātmanaḥ pṛthaktvena yaj jñānaṃ deha-vināśa
GE07bhg4c18u:627: evātma-vināśa iti yaj jñānam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:628: yena ca nānā-vidhān bhāvān abhiprāyān vetti |
GE07bhg4c18u:629: deha evātmeti dehād anyo deha-parimāṇa ātmeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:631: dehād anyo nava-viśeṣa-guṇāśrayo 'jaḍo vibhur ātmety evaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:634: yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahetukam |
GE07bhg4c18u:635: atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam ||22||
GE07bhg4c18u:636: Śrīdhara : tāmasaṃ jñānam āha yad iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:637: ekasmin kārye dehe pratimādau yā kṛtsnavat paripūrṇavat sattama etāvān eva ātmeśvaro yā ity abhiniveśa-yuktam ahaitukaṃ nirupapattikaṃ |
GE07bhg4c18u:643: yad evambhūtaṃ jñānaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam ||22||
GE07bhg4c18u:644: Viśvanātha : tāmasaṃ jñānam āha yat tu jñānam ahaitukam autpattikam eva
GE07bhg4c18u:645: ataeva ekasmin kārye laukika eva snāna-bhojana-pāna-strī-sambhoge
GE07bhg4c18u:648: ataevātattvārthavat tatra tattva-rūpo 'rthaḥ ko 'pi nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:649: alpaṃ paśūnām iva yat kṣudraṃ tat tāmasaṃ jñānam |
GE07bhg4c18u:655: Baladeva : tāmasaṃ jñānam āha yat tv iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:656: yat tu jñānam ahaitukaṃ svābhāvikaṃ na tu śāstrād dhetor jñānam |
GE07bhg4c18u:659: saktaṃ kṛtsnavat pūrṇaṃ nāto 'dhikam astīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:661: alpaṃ paśv-ādi-sādhāraṇyāt tucchaṃ tal laukika-snāna-bhojanādi-jñānaṃ tāmasam ||22||
GE07bhg4c18u:664: aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate ||23||
GE07bhg4c18u:665: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ trividhaṃ karmāha - niyatam iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:669: putrādi-prītyā vāśatru-dveṣeṇa vā yat kṛtaṃ na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:671: tad-vilakṣaṇena niṣkāmeṇa kartrā yat kṛtaṃ karma tat sāttvikam ucyate ||23||
GE07bhg4c18u:672: Viśvanātha: trividhaṃ jñānam uktvā trividhaṃ karmāha - niyataṃ nityatayā vihitaṃ saṅga-rahitam abhiniveśa-śūnyam ataevārāga-dveṣato rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:673: vinaiva kṛtam aphalepsunā phalākāṅkṣā-rahitenaiva kartrā kṛtaṃ karma yat sāttvikam ||23||
GE07bhg4c18u:674: Baladevaḥ: atha karma-traividhyam āha - niyatam iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:678: arāga-dveṣataḥ kṛtaṃ kīrtau rāgād akīrtau dveṣāc ca yan na kṛtaṃ, kintv
GE07bhg4c18u:679: īśvarārcanatayivāphala-prepsunā phalecchā-śūnyena yat karma kṛtaṃ tat sāttvikam ||23||
GE07bhg4c18u:681: yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:684: yat tu karma kāmepsunā phalaṃ prāptum icchatā sāhaṅkāreṇa mat-samaḥ[*ENDNOTE] ko 'nyaḥ śrotriyo 'stīty evaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:690: Baladevaḥ: yat kāmepsunā phalākāṅkṣiṇā sāhaṅkāreṇa kartṛtvābhiniveśinā janena bahulāyāsam atikleśa-yuktaṃ karma kriyate tad rājasam ||24||
GE07bhg4c18u:692: anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam |
GE07bhg4c18u:693: mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate ||25||
GE07bhg4c18u:699: pauruṣaṃ ca sva-sāmarthyam anapekṣyāparyālocya kevalaṃ mohād eva yat karmārabhyate tat tāmasam ucyate ||25||
GE07bhg4c18u:700: Viśvanātha: anu karmānuṣṭhānānantaram āyatyāṃ bhāvinaṃ bandhaṃ rāja-dasyu-yama-dūtādibhir bandhanaṃ |
GE07bhg4c18u:702: hiṃsāṃ svasya nāśaṃ ca anapekṣyāparyālocya pauruṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:703: vyavahārika-puruṣa-mātra-kartavyaṃ karma mohād ajñānād eva yad ārabhyate
GE07bhg4c18u:708: pauruṣaṃ sabalaṃ cānavekṣya yat karma mohād ārabhyate tat tāmasam ||25||
GE07bhg4c18u:712: Śrīdhara: kartāraṃ trividham āha mukta-saṅga iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:719: ārabdhasya karmaṇaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca nirvikāro harṣa-viṣāda-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:723: Baladevaḥ: atha kartṛ-traividhyam āha mukteti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:732: siddhāv asiddhau ca nirvikāro sukhena duḥkhena ca rahitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:758: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate ||28||
GE07bhg4c18u:759: Śrīdhara: tāmasaṃ kartāram āha ayukta iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:770: yad adya śvo vā kartavyaṃ tan māsenāpi na karoti
GE07bhg4c18u:771: | yaś caivambhūtaḥ sa kartā tāmasa ucyate ||28||
GE07bhg4c18u:772: kartṛ-traividhyenaiva jñātur api traividhyam uktaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:773: karma-traividhyena ca jñeyasyāpi traividhyam uktaṃ jñātavyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:774: buddhes traividhyena karaṇasyāpi traividhyam uktaṃ bhaviṣyati ||28||
GE07bhg4c18u:775: Viśvanāthaḥ - ayukto 'naucitya-kārī prākṛtaḥ prakṛtau sva-svabhāva eva
GE07bhg4c18u:776: vartamānaḥ, yad eva sva-manasi āyāti tad evānutiṣṭhati, na tu guror api vacaḥ pramāṇayatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:778: tad evaṃ jñānibhir ukta-lakṣaṇaḥ sāttvika eva tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sāttvikam eva karma-niṣṭhaṃ jñānam āśrayaṇīyaṃ sāttvikam eva karma kartavyaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:780: eṣa eva sannyāso jñāninām iti me jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:782: bhaktānāṃ tu triguṇātītam eva jñānaṃ triguṇātītaṃ me karma bhakti-yogākhyaṃ triguṇātītā eva kartāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:784: kaivalyaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ rajo vaikalpikaṃ tu yat |
GE07bhg4c18u:793: kiṃ ca na kevalam etat trikam eva bhakti-mate guṇātītam api tu
GE07bhg4c18u:799: vanaṃ tu sāttviko vāso grāmo rājasa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:802: sāttvikaṃ sukham ātmotthaṃ viṣayotthaṃ tu rājasam |
GE07bhg4c18u:805: tad evaṃ guṇātītānāṃ bhaktānāṃ bhakti-sambandhīni jñāna-karma-śraddhādau
GE07bhg4c18u:807: sāttvikānāṃ jñānināṃ jñāna-sambandhīni tāni sarvāṇi sāttvikāny eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:808: rājasānāṃ karmiṇāṃ tāni sarvāṇi rājasāny eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:809: tāmasānām ucchṛṅkhalānāṃ tāni sarvāṇi tāmasāny eveti śrī-gītā-bhāgavatārtha-dṛṣṭyā jñeyam
GE07bhg4c18u:815: sva-prakṛty-anusāreṇaiva, na tu śāstrānusāreṇa karma-kṛd ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:824: buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c18u:826: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ buddher dhṛteś ca traividhyaṃ pratijānīte buddher bhedam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:828: Viśvanātha: jñānibhiḥ sarvam api vastu sāttvikam evopādeyam iti jñāpayituṃ buddhy-ādīnām api traividhyam āha buddher iti ||29||
GE07bhg4c18u:829: Baladeva: evaṃ jñāna-jñeya-parijñātṝṇāṃ traividhyam uktvā buddhi-dhṛtyos
GE07bhg4c18u:833: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye |
GE07bhg4c18u:834: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī ||30||
GE07bhg4c18u:835: Śrīdhara: atra buddhes traividhyam āha pravṛttiṃ ceti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:838: yasmin deśe kāle ca yat kāryam akāryaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:840: kathaṃ bandhaḥ kathaṃ vā mokṣe iti yā buddhir antaṃkaraṇaṃ vetti sā sāttvikī |
GE07bhg4c18u:841: yayā pumān vettīti vaktavye karaṇe kartṛtvopacāraḥ kāṣṭhāni pacantītivat ||30||
GE07bhg4c18u:843: Baladeva: tatra buddhes traividhyam āha pravṛttiṃ ceti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:844: yā buddhir dharme pravṛttim adharmān nivṛttiṃ ca vetti, yayā vettīti vaktavya
GE07bhg4c18u:847: niṣkāmaṃ karma kāryaṃ sa-kāmaṃ tv akāryam iti kāryākārye yā vetti
GE07bhg4c18u:848: aśāstrīya-pravṛttito bhayaṃ śāstrīya-pravṛttitas tv abhayam iti bhayābhaye yā vetti, bandhaṃ saṃsāra-yāthātmyaṃ mokṣaṃ tac-cheda-yāthāmyaṃ ca yā vetti sā buddhiḥ sāttvikī ||30||
GE07bhg4c18u:850: yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:851: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī ||31||
GE07bhg4c18u:859: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā |
GE07bhg4c18u:860: sarvārthān viparītāñś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī ||32||
GE07bhg4c18u:861: Śrīdhara: tāmasīṃ buddhim āha adharmam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:866: yad vā antaḥkaraṇasya dharmiṇo buddhir apy
GE07bhg4c18u:872: kuṭhāraś chinattītivat yayā manyata ity arthaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c18u:873: Baladevaḥ : tāmasīṃ buddhim āha adharmam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:875: sarvārthān viparītāni sādhum asādhum asādhuṃ ca sādhuṃ,
GE07bhg4c18u:876: paraṃ tattvam aparam aparaṃ ca tattvaṃ param ity evaṃ sarvān arthān viparītān manyata ity arthaḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c18u:880: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ dhṛtes traividhyam āha dhṛtyeti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:881: yogena cittaigāgreṇa hetunā 'vyabhicāriṇyā viṣayāntaram adhārayantyā yayā dhṛtyā manasaḥ prāṇānām indriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā dhārayate niyacchati sā dhṛtiḥ sāttvikī ||33||
GE07bhg4c18u:883: Baladevaḥ : dhṛtes traividhyam āha dhṛtyeti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:885: manaḥ-prāṇendriyāṇāṃ yogopāya-bhūtāḥ kriyāḥ puruṣo dhārayate, sā dhṛtiḥ sāttvikī |
GE07bhg4c18u:888: tenāvyabhicāriṇyā tad anyaṃ viṣayam agṛhṇantyety arthaḥ ||33||
GE07bhg4c18u:891: prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī ||34||
GE07bhg4c18u:892: Śrīdhara: rājasīṃ dhṛtim āha yayā tv iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:895: tat-saṅgena phalākāṅkṣī ca bhavati sā rājasī dhṛtiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:898: yayā dharmādīn tat-sādhana-bhūtā manaḥ-prāṇendriya-kriyā dhārayatee, sā dhṛtiḥ rājasī |
GE07bhg4c18u:900: yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:901: na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī ||35||
GE07bhg4c18u:902: Śrīdhara : tāmasīṃ dhṛtim āha yayeti duṣṭāviveka-bahulā medhā yasya sa
GE07bhg4c18u:903: durmedhāḥ puruṣo yayā dhṛtyā svapnādīn na vimuñcati punaḥ punar āvartayati
GE07bhg4c18u:906: Baladevaḥ : yayā svapnādīn na vimuñcati durmedhās tān dhārayaty eva, sā dhṛtis tāmasī |
GE07bhg4c18u:908: svapnādi-śabdais tad-dhetu-bhūtā manaḥ-prāṇendriya-kriyā yayā dhārayate sā
GE07bhg4c18u:911: sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha |
GE07bhg4c18u:912: abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchhati ||36||
GE07bhg4c18u:915: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ sukhasya traividhyaṃ pratijānīte 'rdhena sukham iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:916: spaṣṭo 'rthaḥ ||36|| tatra sāttvikaṃ sukham āha abhyāsād iti sārdhena |
GE07bhg4c18u:917: yatra yasmiṃś ca sukhe 'bhyāsād atiparicayād ramate |
GE07bhg4c18u:920: yasmin ramamāṇaś ca duḥkhasyāntam avasānaṃ nitarāṃ gacchati prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c18u:921: kīdṛśaṃ tat ? yat tat kim apy agre prathamaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:922: viṣam iva manaḥ-saṃyamādhīnatvād duḥkhāvaham iva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:926: tato jātaṃ yat sukhaṃ tat sāttvikaṃ proktaṃ yogibhiḥ ||37||
GE07bhg4c18u:927: Viśvanātha - sāttvikaṃ sukham āha sārdhena abhyāsāt punar anuśīlanād eva ramate, na tu viṣayeṣv ivotpattyaiva ramata ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:928: duḥkhāntaṃ nigacchati yasmin ramamāṇaḥ saṃsāra-duḥkhaṃ taratīty arthaḥ ||36|| viṣam iveti indriya-mano-nirodho hi prathamaṃ duḥkhada eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:929: Baladevaḥ : atha sukha-traividhyaṃ pratījānīte sukhaṃ tv ity ardhakena |
GE07bhg4c18u:930: tatra sāttvikaṃ sukham āha abhyāsād iti sārdhakena |
GE07bhg4c18u:931: abhyāsāt punaḥ punaḥ pariśīlanād yatra ramate, na tu viṣayeṣv ivotpattyā |
GE07bhg4c18u:932: yasmin ramamāṇo duḥkhāntaṃ nigacchati saṃsāraṃ tarati ||36|| yac cāgre prathamaṃ viṣam iva manaḥ-saṃyama-kleśa-sattvād viviktātma-prakāśāc cātiduḥkhāvaham iva bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:935: yac cātma-sambandhinyā buddheḥ prasādāj jāyate tat sāttvikaṃ sukham |
GE07bhg4c18u:940: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam ||38||
GE07bhg4c18u:941: Śrīdhara : rājasaṃ sukham āha viṣayeti viṣayāṇām indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogād yat tat prasiddhaṃ strī-saṃsargādi-sukham amṛtam upamā yasya tādṛśaṃ bhavaty agre prathamam |
GE07bhg4c18u:942: pariṇāme tu viṣa-tulyam ihāmutra ca duḥkha-hetutvāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:945: Baladeva : viṣayair yuvati-rūpa-sparśādibhiḥ sahendriyāṇāṃ cakṣus tv
GE07bhg4c18u:946: agādīnāṃ saṃyogāt sambandhāt yad agre pūrvam amṛtopamam atisvādu-pariṇāme
GE07bhg4c18u:947: 'vasāne tu niraya-hetutvād viṣopamam atiduḥkhāvahaṃ bhavati tad rājasaṃ sukham ||38||
GE07bhg4c18u:949: yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:951: Śrīdhara : tāmasaṃ sukham āha yad iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:953: ca paścād api yat sukham ātmano moha-karam |
GE07bhg4c18u:954: tad evāha nidrā ālasyaṃ ca pramādaś ca kartavyārthāvadhāraṇa-rāhityena mano-grāhyam etebhya uttiṣṭhati yat sukhaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam ||39||
GE07bhg4c18u:956: Baladeva : yad-agre 'nubhava-kāle anubandhe paścād vipāka-kāle cātmano mohanaṃ vastu-yāthātmyāvarakaṃ, yac ca nidrādibhya uttiṣṭhati jāyate tat
GE07bhg4c18u:961: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:962: sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c18u:963: Śrīdhara : anuktam api saṅgṛhṇan prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharati na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:964: ebhiḥ prakṛti-sambhavaiḥ sattvādibhis tribhir guṇair muktaṃ prāṇi-jātam |
GE07bhg4c18u:968: Viśvanātha : anuktam api saṅgṛhṇan prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharati neti tat sattvaṃ prāṇi-jātam anyac ca vastu-mātraṃ kvāpi nāsti yad ebhiḥ prakṛtijais tribhir guṇair muktaṃ rahitaṃ syād ataḥ sarvam eva vastu-jātaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:970: tatra sāttvikam evopādeyaṃ rājasa-tāmase tu nopādeya iti
GE07bhg4c18u:972: Baladevaḥ : prakaraṇārtham upasaṃhann anuktam api saṅgṛhṇāti na tad iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:973: pṛthivyāṃ manuṣyādiṣu divi svargādau deveṣu ca prakṛtiṃ saṃsṛṣṭeṣu brahmādi-stambānteṣv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:974: tat sattvaṃ prāṇi-jātam anyac ca vastu
GE07bhg4c18u:976: yad ebhiḥ prakṛtijais tribhir guṇair muktaṃ virahitaṃ syāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:977: tathā ca triguṇātmakeṣu vastuṣu sāttvikasyaivopayogitvāt tad eva grāhyam anyat tu tyājyam iti prakaraṇārthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c18u:981: Śrīdhara : nanu ca yady evaṃ sarvam api kriyā-kāraka-phalādikaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:982: prāṇi-jātaṃ ca triguṇātmakam eva tarhi katham asya mokṣa ity apekṣāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:983: sva-svādhikāra-vihitaiḥ karmabhiḥ parameśvarārādhanāt tat-prasāda-labdha-jñānenety evaṃ sarva-gītārtha-sāraṃ saṅgṛhya pradarśayituṃ prakaraṇāntaram ārabhate |
GE07bhg4c18u:987: brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ ca śūdrāṇāṃ ca karmāṇi pravibhaktāni prakarṣeṇa vibhāgato vihitāni
GE07bhg4c18u:989: vibhāgopalakṣaṇam āha svabhāvaḥ sāttvikādiḥ prabhavati prādurbhavati yebhyas tair guṇair upakakṣaṇa-bhūtaiḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:997: Viśvanātha : kiṃ ca triguṇātmakam api prāṇi-jātaṃ svādhikāra-prāptena
GE07bhg4c18u:998: vihita-karmaṇā parameśvaram ārādhya kṛtārthībhivatītyāha brāhmaṇeti ṣaḍbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:999: sva-bhāvenotpattyaiva prabhavanti prādurbhavanti ye guṇāḥ sattvādayas taiḥ prakarṣeṇa vibhaktāni pṛthak-kṛtāni karmāṇi brāhmaṇādīnāṃ vihitāni santīty arthaḥ ||41||
GE07bhg4c18u:1000: Baladeva : yadyapi sarvāṇi vastūni triguṇātmakāni tathāpi brāhmaṇādayaś
GE07bhg4c18u:1001: cet sva-vihitāni karmāṇi bhagavad-ārādhana-bhāvenānutiṣṭheyus tadā tāni jñāna-niṣṭhām utpādya mocakāni bhavantiīti vaktuṃ prakaraṇam ārabhate
GE07bhg4c18u:1004: brāhmaṇādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ karmāṇi svabhāv-prabhavair guṇaiḥ saha śāstreṇa
GE07bhg4c18u:1005: pravibhaktāni, svabhāvaḥ prāktana-saṃskāras tasmāt prabhavanti ye guṇāḥ sattvādyās taiḥ saha śāstreṇa teṣāṃ karmāṇi vibhajyoktāni |
GE07bhg4c18u:1007: guṇaka-brāhmaṇādayas teṣām etāni karmāṇīti tatra sattva-pradhāno brāhmaṇaḥ praśāntatvāt sattvopasarjan-rajaḥ-pradhānaḥ kṣatriya īśvara-svabhāvatvāt,
GE07bhg4c18u:1008: tama-upasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhāno viṭ ihāpradhānatvāt rajaupasarjanatamaḥpradhānaḥ śūdro mūḍha-svabhāvatvāt
GE07bhg4c18u:1011: śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:1013: Śrīdhara : tatra brāhmaṇasya svābhāvikāni karmāṇy āha śama iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1023: yad uktaṃ svabhāva-prabhavair guṇaiḥ pravibhaktānīti tad evoktaṃ svabhāvajam iti ||42||
GE07bhg4c18u:1024: Viśvanātha : tatra sattva-pradhānānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ svabhāvikāni karmāṇy āha śama iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1026: damo bāhyendriya-nigrahas tapaḥ śarīrādi jñāna-vijñāne śāstrānubhavotthe āstikyaṃ śāstrārthe
GE07bhg4c18u:1027: evam ādi brahma-karma brāhmaṇasya karma svabhāvajaṃ svābhāvikam ||42||
GE07bhg4c18u:1028: Baladeva : brāhmaṇasya svābhāvikaṃ karmāha śama iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1036: āstikyaṃ sarvaveda-vedyo harir nikhilaika-karaṇaṃ sva-vvihitaiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ kevalayā bhaktyā ca santoṣitaḥ sva-paryantaṃ sarvam arpayatīti śāstrādhigate 'rthe satyatva-viniścayaḥ etat svābhāvikaṃ brahma-karma |
GE07bhg4c18u:1039: kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śaucaṃ dānam indriya-saṃyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1047: śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1048: dānam īśvarabhāvaś ca kṣātraṃ karma svabhāvajam ||43||
GE07bhg4c18u:1049: Śrīdhara: kṣatriyasya svābhāvikāni karmāṇy āha śauryam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1060: śauryaṃ parākramaḥ tejaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ dhṛtir dhairyaṃ īśvara-bhāvo
GE07bhg4c18u:1084: gā raksatīti go-rakṣas tasya bhāvo gaurakṣyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1095: brāhmaṇādīnāṃ dvijanmanāṃ paricaryā śūdrasya svābhāvikaṃ karma |
GE07bhg4c18u:1099: sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1100: svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu ||45||
GE07bhg4c18u:1101: Śrīdhara: evambhūtasya brāhmaṇādi-karmaṇo jñāna-hetutvam āha sve sve iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1102: sva-svādhikāra-vihite karmaṇy abhirataḥ pariniṣṭhito naraḥ saṃsiddhiṃ jñāna-yogyatāṃ labhate
GE07bhg4c18u:1108: Baladevaḥ: uktānāṃ karmaṇāṃ jñāna-hetutām āha sve sve iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1109: sva-sva-varṇāśrama-vihite karmaṇy abhiratas tad-anuṣṭhātā naraḥ saṃsiddhiṃ viśa-tantuvat karmāntargataṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ labhate |
GE07bhg4c18u:1110: nanu bandhakena karmaṇāṃ vimocikā jñāna-niṣṭhā katham iti ced buddhi-viśeṣād ity āha sva-karmeti
GE07bhg4c18u:1112: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1113: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ ||46||
GE07bhg4c18u:1115: yato 'ntathāmiṇaḥ parameśvarād bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ pravṛttiś ceṣṭā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1116: yena ca kāraṇātmanā sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ tataṃ vyāptam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1117: tam īśvaraṃ sva-karmaṇābhyarcya pūjayitvā siddhiṃ labhate
GE07bhg4c18u:1120: tam evābhyarcya ity anena karmaṇā parameśaras tuṣyatv iti manasā tad-arpaṇam eva tad-abhyarcanam
GE07bhg4c18u:1123: pravṛttir bhavati , yena cedaṃ sarvaṃ jagat taṃ vyāptaṃ tam
GE07bhg4c18u:1125: sva-prabhus tuṣyatu iti manasā tasmiṃs tat samarpya mānavaḥ siddhiṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ vindati
GE07bhg4c18u:1129: Śrīdhara: svakarmeti viśeṣaṇasya phalam āha śreyān iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1131: sva-dharmaḥ samyag-anuṣṭhitād api para-dharmāt śreyān śreṣṭhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1132: na ca bandhu-vadhādi-muktād yuddhādeḥ svadharmād bhikṣāṭanādi para-dharmaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1134: yataḥ svabhāvena pūrvoktena niyataṃ niyamenoktaṃ karma kurvan kilbiṣaṃ nāpnoti ||47||
GE07bhg4c18u:1135: Viśvanātha: na ca kriyādibhiḥ sva-dharmaṃ rājasaṃ ca vīkṣya tatra anabhirucyā sāttvikaṃ karma kartavyam ity āha śreyān iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1137: śreṣṭhād api svanuṣṭhitāt samyag anuṣṭhitād api svadharmo viguṇo nikṛṣṭo
GE07bhg4c18u:1140: sva-dharmaṃ yuddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣāṭanādi-rūpa-para-dharmas tvayā nānusṭheya iti bhāvaḥ ||47||
GE07bhg4c18u:1141: Baladevaḥ: nanu kṣatriyādi-dharmāṇāṃ rājasāditvāt teṣu ruci-śūnyaiḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1142: kṣatriyādibhiḥ sāttviko brahma-dharma evānuṣṭheya iti cet tatrāha śreyān iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1143: sva-dharmo viguṇaḥ nikṛṣṭo 'pi samyag-anuṣṭhito 'pi vā para-dharmād
GE07bhg4c18u:1144: utkṛṣṭāt svanuṣṭhitāc ca śreyān atipraśasto vihitatvāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:1146: sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet |
GE07bhg4c18u:1148: Śrīdhara: yadi punaḥ sāṅkhya-dṛṣṭya sva-dharme hiṃsā-lakṣaṇaṃ doṣaṃ matvā para-dharmaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ manyase tarhi sadoṣatvaṃ para-dharme 'pi tulyam ity āśayenāha sahajam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1149: sahajaṃ svabhāva-vihitaṃ karma sa-doṣam api na tyajet |
GE07bhg4c18u:1150: hi yasmāt sarve 'py ārambhāḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthāni sarvāṇy api karmāṇi doṣeṇa kenacid āvṛtā vyāptā eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1152: ato yathāgner dhūma-rūpaṃ doṣam apākṛtya pratāpa eva
GE07bhg4c18u:1153: tamaḥ-śītādi-nivṛttaye sevyate tathā karmaṇo 'pi doṣāṃśaṃ vihāya guṇāṃśa
GE07bhg4c18u:1155: Viśvanātha: na ca sva-dharme eva kevalaṃ doṣo 'stīti mantavyam, yataḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1156: para-dharmeṣv api doṣaḥ kaścid asty evety āha sahajam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1158: svabhāva-vihitaṃ hi yataḥ sarve 'py ārambhāḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-sādhanāni karmāṇi doṣeṇāvṛtā eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1159: yathā dhūmena doṣeṇāvṛta eva vahnir dṛśyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:1161: dhūma-rūpaṃ doṣam apākṛtya tasya tāpa eva tamaḥ-śītādi-nivṛttaye yathā sevyate tathā karmaṇo 'pi doṣāṃśaṃ vihāya guṇāṃśa eva sattva-śuddhaye
GE07bhg4c18u:1163: Baladevaḥ: na khalu kṣatriyādi-dharmā eva yuddhādayaḥ sa-doṣāḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1164: brahma-dharmāś ca tathety āha sahajam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1165: sahajaṃ svabhāva-prāptaṃ karma sadoṣam api hiṃsādi-miśram api na tyajed api tu vihitatvāt kuryād eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1166: nirdoṣatva-buddhyā brahma-karmaṇā cared ity arthaḥ yataḥ sarveti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1168: dravya-sādhyatvāc ca sāmānyataḥ kenacid doṣeṇāvṛtā vyāptā eva bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1169: dhūmenevāgnir iti yathāgner dhūmāṃśam apākṛtya śītādi-nivṛttaye tāpaḥ sevyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:1175: Śrīdhara: nanu karmaṇi kriyamāṇe kathaṃ doṣāṃśa-prahāṇena guṇāṃśa eva sampadyata ity apekṣāyām āha asakta-buddhir iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1179: vigata-spṛhaḥ vigatā spṛhā phala-viṣayecchā yasmāt saḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1180: evambhūtena saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ (Gītā 18.9) |
GE07bhg4c18u:1182: karmāsakti-tat-phalayos tyāga-lakṣaṇena sannyāsena naiṣkarmyasiddhiṃ sarva-karma-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇāṃ sattva-śuddhim adhigacchati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1184: saṅga-phalayos tyāgena karmānuṣṭhānam api naiṣkarmyam eva kartṛtvābhiniveśābhāvāt ( yad uktam - naiva kiñcit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit (Gītā 5.8) ity ādi śloka-catuṣṭayena ), tathāpy
GE07bhg4c18u:1190: tasya kālena sādhana-paripākato yogārūḍhatva-daśāyāṃ karmaṇāṃ svarūpeṇāpi tyāga-rūpaṃ dvitīya-sannyāsam āha asakta-buddhiḥ sarvatrāpi
GE07bhg4c18u:1191: prākṛta-vastuṣu na saktā āsakti-śūnyā buddhir yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1192: ato jitātmā vaśīkṛta-citto vigatā brahma-loka-paryanteṣv api sukheṣu spṛhā yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1193: tataś ca sannyāsena karmaṇāṃ svarūpeṇāpi tyāgena naiṣkarmyasya paramāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ siddhim adhigacchati prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1194: yogārūḍha-daśāyāṃ tasya naiṣkarmyam atiśayena siddhir bhavatīty arthaḥ ||49||
GE07bhg4c18u:1196: karma-niṣṭhayānubhūta-svarūpas tataḥ karma-niṣṭhāṃ svarūpatas tyajed ity
GE07bhg4c18u:1198: sarvatrātmātirikteṣu vastuṣv asakta-buddhir yato jitātmā svātmānandāsvādena vaśīkṛta-manā ataeva vigata-spṛha
GE07bhg4c18u:1200: svātmānandāsvāda-vikṣepakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ sannyāsena svarūpatas tyāgena paramāṃ naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇāṃ siddhim adhigacchati yogārūḍhaḥ san |
GE07bhg4c18u:1201: evam evoktaṃ tṛtīye yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād (Gītā 3.17) ity ādinā ||49||
GE07bhg4c18u:1203: siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me |
GE07bhg4c18u:1204: samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā ||50||
GE07bhg4c18u:1207: naiṣkarmya-siddhiṃ prāptaḥ san yathā yena prakāreṇa brahma prāpnoti tathā taṃ prakāraṃ saṅkṣepeṇaiva me vacanān nibodha |
GE07bhg4c18u:1208: pratiṣṭhitā yā brahma-prāptiḥ tām imāṃ tathā darśayitum āha niṣṭhā jñānasya yā pareti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1210: Viśvanātha: tataś ca yathā yena prakāreṇa brahma prāpnoti brahmānubhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1211: saiva jñānasya niṣṭhā parā paramo 'nta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1214: vidyāyā apy uparamārambhe yena prakāreṇa jñāna-sannyāsaṃ kṛtvā brahmānubhavet taṃ budhyasvety arthaḥ ||50||
GE07bhg4c18u:1217: sarva-karma-tyāgāntāṃ ātma-dhyāna-niṣṭhāṃ prāpto yathā yena prakāreṇa sthito brahma prāpnoti āvirbhāvita-guṇāṣṭakaṃ svarūpam anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1218: tathā taṃ prakāraṃ samāsena gadato me matto nibodha |
GE07bhg4c18u:1220: pareśa-viṣayā jñāna-niṣṭhā tvāṃ prati mayocyate tāṃ ca śṛṇu ||50||
GE07bhg4c18u:1222: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:1223: śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca ||51||
GE07bhg4c18u:1226: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham |
GE07bhg4c18u:1229: uktena prakāreṇa viśuddhayā pūrvoktayā sāttvikyā buddhyā yukto dhṛtyā sāttvikyā ātmānaṃ tām eva buddhiṃ niyamya niścalāṃ kṛtvā śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā tad-viṣayau rāga-dveṣau vyudasya buddhyā viśuddhayā yukta ity ādīnāṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ ||51|| kiṃ ca vivikteti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1232: saṃyata-vāg-deha-citto bhūtvā nityaṃ sarvadā dhyānena yo yogo
GE07bhg4c18u:1233: brahma-saṃsparśas tat-paraḥ san dhyānāvicchedārthaṃ punaḥ punar dṛḍhaṃ vairāgyaṃ samyag upāśrito bhūtvā ||52|| tataś cāhaṃkāram iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1235: 'ham ity ādy ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ durāgrahaṃ darpaṃ yoga-balād
GE07bhg4c18u:1236: unmārga-pravṛtti-lakṣaṇaṃ prārabdha-vaśāt prāpyamāneṣv api viṣayeṣu kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigrahaṃ ca vimucya viśeṣeṇa tyaktvā balād āpanneṣu nirma maḥ san śāntaḥ paramām upaśāntiṃ prāpto brahma-bhūyāya brahmāham iti naiścalyenāvasthānāya kalpate yogyaś ca bhavati ||53||
GE07bhg4c18u:1237: Viśvanātha: buddhyā viśuddhayā sāttvikyā dhṛtyāpi sāttvikyātmānaṃ mano
GE07bhg4c18u:1239: dhyānena bhagavac-cintanenaiva yaḥ paro yogas tat-parāyaṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1242: śāntaḥ sattva-guṇasyāpy upaśāntimān iti kṛta-jñāna-sannyāsa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1245: ajñāna-jñānayor uparamaṃ vinā brahmānubhavānupattir iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1248: viśuddhayā sāttvikyā buddhyā yuktas tādṛśyā dhṛtyā cātmānaṃ mano niyamya samādhi-yogyaṃ kṛtvā śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā tān sannihitān vidhāya rāga-dveṣau ca tad-dhetukau
GE07bhg4c18u:1259: tad-dhetukaḥ prārabdha-śeṣa-vaśād upāgateṣu bhogyeṣu kāmo 'bhilāṣaḥ, teṣv anyair apahṛteṣu krodhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1261: tan etān ahaṅkārādīn vimucya nirmamaḥ san brahma-bhūyāya
GE07bhg4c18u:1266: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1267: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām ||54||
GE07bhg4c18u:1268: Śrīdhara: brahmāham iti naiścalyenāvasthānasya phalam āha brahmeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1269: brahma-bhūto brahmaṇy avasthitaḥ prasanna-cittaḥ naṣṭaṃ na śocati na cāprāptaṃ kāṅkṣati dehādya-abhimānābhāvāt
GE07bhg4c18u:1270: ataeva sarveṣv api bhūteṣu samaḥ san rāga-dveṣam ādikṛta-vikṣepābhāvāt sarva-bhūteṣu
GE07bhg4c18u:1276: tataś ca pūrva-daśāyām iva naṣṭaṃ na śocati na cāprāptaṃ kāṅkṣati
GE07bhg4c18u:1278: sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhadrābhadreṣu bālaka iva samaḥ bāhyānusandhānābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1279: tataś ca nirindhanāgnāv iva jñāne śānte 'py anaśvarāṃ jñānāntarbhūtāṃ mad-bhaktiṃ śravaṇa-kīrtanādi-rūpāṃ labhate |
GE07bhg4c18u:1282: ataeva parāṃ jñānād anyāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ niṣkāma-karma-jñānādy-urvaritatvena kevalām ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1283: labhata iti pūrvaṃ jñāna-vairāgyādiṣu mokṣa-siddhy-arthaṃ kalayā vartamānāyā api
GE07bhg4c18u:1284: sarva-bhūteṣv antaryāmina iva tasyāḥ spaṣṭopalabdhir nāsīd iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1285: ataeva kuruta ity anuktvā labhata iti prayuktam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1286: māṣam udgādiṣu militāṃ teṣu naṣṭeṣv apy anaśvarāṃ kāñcana-maṇikām iva tebhyaḥ pṛthaktayā kevalāṃ labhata itivat |
GE07bhg4c18u:1288: lābha-sambhavo 'sti nāpi tasyāḥ phalaṃ sāyujyam ity ataḥ parā-śabdena
GE07bhg4c18u:1290: Baladeva: tasya brahma-bhūyottara-bhāvinaṃ lābham āha brahmeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1295: sa evambhūto mad-anyāt kāṃścit prati na śocati na ca tān kāṅkṣati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1296: sarveṣu mad-anyeṣūccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu samaḥ heyatvāviśeṣālloṣṭra-kāṣṭhavattvāni manyamānaḥ īdṛśaḥ san parāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1297: mad-bhaktiṃ niṣṭhāṃ jñānasya yā parā ity (Gītā 18.50) uktāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1301: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1302: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram ||55||
GE07bhg4c18u:1304: tathā ca parayā bhaktyā tattvato mām abhijānāti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1305: kathambhūtam, yāvān sarva-vyāpī yaś cāsmi sac-cid-ānanda-ghanas tathābhutaṃ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1306: tataś ca mām evaṃ tattvato jñātvā
GE07bhg4c18u:1307: tad-anantaraṃ tasya jñānasya uparame sati māṃ viśate paramānanda-rūpo
GE07bhg4c18u:1309: Viśvanātha: nanu tayā labdhayā bhaktyā tadānīṃ tasya kiṃ syād ity ato
GE07bhg4c18u:1311: ahaṃ yāvān yaś cāsmi taṃ māṃ tat-padārthaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1312: jñānī vā nānāvidho bhakto vā bhaktyaiva tattvato 'bhijānāti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1314: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt prastutaḥ sa jñānī tatas tayā bhaktyaiva tad-anantaraṃ vidyoparamād uttara-kāla eva māṃ jñātvā māṃ viśati mat-sāyujya-sukham anubhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1315: mama māyātītatvād avidyāyāś ca māyātvād vidyayāpy aham avagamya[*ENDNOTE] iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1316: yat tu sāṅkhya-yogau ca vairāgyaṃ tapo bhaktiś ca keśave |
GE07bhg4c18u:1318: vidyā iti nārada-pañcarātre vidyā-vṛttitvena bhaktiḥ śrūyate |
GE07bhg4c18u:1319: tat khalu hlādinī-śakti-vṛtter bhakter eva kalā kācid vidyā-sāphalyārthaṃ vidyāyāṃ praviṣṭā
GE07bhg4c18u:1323: sad-guṇamayyā vidyāyā vṛttir vastuto na bhavati, ato hy ajñāna-nivartakatvenaiva vidyāyāḥ kāraṇatvaṃ tat-padārtha-jñāne tu bhakter eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1324: kiṃ ca - sattvāt sañjāyate jñānam iti smṛteḥ (Gītā 14.17) sattvajaṃ jñānaṃ sattvam eva
GE07bhg4c18u:1325: tac ca sattvaṃ vidyā-śabdenocyate yathā tathā bhakty-utthaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1326: jñānaṃ bhaktir eva saiva kvacit bhakti-śabdena kvacit jñāna-śabdena
GE07bhg4c18u:1327: cocyata iti jñānam api dvividhaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1328: tatra prathamaṃ jñānaṃ saṃnyasya dvitīyena jñānena brahma-sāyujyam āpnuyād ity ekādaśa-skandha-pañcaviṃśaty-adhyāya-dṛṣṭyāpi[*ENDNOTE] jñeyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1329: atra kecid bhaktyā vinaiva kevalenaiva jñānena sāyujyārthinas te jñāni-māninaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1331: anye tu bhaktyā vinā kevalena jñānena na muktir iti jñātvā bhakti-miśram eva jñānam abhasyanto bhagavāṃs tu māyopādhir eveti bhagavad-vapur guṇa-mayaṃ manyamānā yogārūḍhatva-daśām
GE07bhg4c18u:1332: api prāptās te 'pi jñānino vimukta-mānino vigītā eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1336: catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak || (BhP 11.5.2)
GE07bhg4c18u:1339: na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ || (BhP 11.5.3) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1340: asyārthaḥ ye na bhajanti ye ca bhajanto 'py avajānanti te sannyāsino 'pi
GE07bhg4c18u:1345: āruhya kṛcchreṇa paraṃ padaṃ tataḥ patanty adho 'nādṛta-yuṣmad-aṅghrayaḥ || (BhP 10.2.32) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1347: anādṛta-yuṣmad-aṅghraya iti tanor guṇa-mayatva-buddhir eva tanor anādaraḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1349: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1351: vastutas tu mānuṣī sā tanuḥ saccidānandam apy eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1357: tām ṛte paramānandaṃ kaḥ paśyet tam imaṃ prabhum || iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1358: evaṃ ca bhagavat-tanoḥ saccidānandamayatve k ptaṃ sac-cid-ānanda-vigraham
GE07bhg4c18u:1360: śābdaṃ brahma vapur dadhat ity ādi śrutiḥ-smṛti-para-sahasra-vacaneṣu pramāṇeṣu satsv api
GE07bhg4c18u:1361: māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram iti (ŚvetU 4.2) iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1362: śruti-dṛṣṭyaiva bhagavān api māyopādhir iti manyante kintu svarūpa-bhūtayā
GE07bhg4c18u:1367: svarūpa-bhūtā cic-chaktir evābhidhīyate na tv asvarūpa-bhūtā triguṇa-mayy
GE07bhg4c18u:1368: eva śaktir iti tasyāḥ śruter arthaṃ na manyante |
GE07bhg4c18u:1369: yad vā prakṛtiṃ durgāṃ māyinaṃ tu maheśvaraṃ śambhuṃ vidyād ity artham api naiva manyante
GE07bhg4c18u:1370: ato bhagavad-aparādhena jīvan-muktva-daśāṃ prāptā api te 'dhaḥ patanti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1375: te ca phala-prāptau satyām arthāt nāsti sādhanopayoga iti matvā
GE07bhg4c18u:1376: jñāna-sannyāsa-kāle jñānaṃ tatra guṇī-bhūtāṃ bhaktim api santyajya,
GE07bhg4c18u:1378: śrī-vigrahāparādhena bhaktyā api jñānena sārdham antardhānād bhaktiṃ te punar naiva labhante
GE07bhg4c18u:1379: bhaktyā vinā ca tat-padārthānanubhāvān mṛṣā-samādhayo jīvan-mukta-mānina eva te jñeyāḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1381: ye tu bhakti-miśraṃ jñānam abhyasyanto bhagavan-mūrtiṃ sac-cid-ānandamayīm
GE07bhg4c18u:1382: eva mānayānāḥ krameṇāvidyāvidyayor uparāme parāṃ bhaktiṃ labhante |
GE07bhg4c18u:1385: eke sāyujyārthaṃ bhaktiṃ kurvantas tayaiva tat padārtham aparokṣīkṛtya tasmin sāyujyaṃ labhante te saṅgītā eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1387: tyakta-mumukṣāḥ śukādivad bhakti-rasa-mādhuryāsvāda eva nimajjanti, te tu parama-saṅgītā eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1389: ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim
GE07bhg4c18u:1391: tad evaṃ caturvidhā jñānino dvaye vigītāḥ patanti, dvaye saṅgītās taranti
GE07bhg4c18u:1393: Baladeva: tataḥ kiṃ tad āha bhaktyeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1395: vibhūtitaś ca yāvān aham asmi taṃ mām parayā mad-bhaktyā tat tv abhijānāty
GE07bhg4c18u:1397: tato mat-parama-bhaktito hetor ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ māṃ tattvato yāthātmyena jñātvānubhūya tad-anantaraṃ tata eva hetor māṃ viśate mayā
GE07bhg4c18u:1399: puraṃ praviśati ity atra pura-saṃyoga eva pratīyate na tu purātmakatvam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1400: atra tattvato 'bhijñāne praveśe ca bhaktir eva hetur ukto bodhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1401: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakyaḥ ity (Gītā 11.54) ādi pūrvokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1403: iti mat-svarūpa-guṇa-vibhūti-tāttvikānubhavād uttarasmin kāle ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1404: yad vā, parayā bhaktyā māṃ tattvato jñātvā tatas tāṃ bhaktim ādāyaiva māṃ viśate |
GE07bhg4c18u:1407: sūtra-kṛt āprāyaṇāt tatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam iti (Vs 4.1.12) āprāyaṇād āmokṣāt tatrāpi ca mokse bhaktir anuvartate iti śrutau dṛṣṭam iti sūtrārthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1408: bhaktyā vinaṣṭāvidyānāṃ bhaktyāḥ svādo vivardhate sitayā naṣṭa-pittānāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1417: sarvāṇi nityāni naimittikāni ca karmāṇi purvokta-krameṇa sarvadā kurvāṇaḥ mad-vyapāśrayaḥ aham eva vyāpāśrayaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1418: āśrayaṇīyo na tu svargādi-phalaṃ yasya sa mat-prasādād śāśvatam anādi sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ padam prāpnoti ||56||
GE07bhg4c18u:1421: mad-bhaktas tu māṃ yathā prāpnoti tad api śṛṇv ity āha sarveti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1422: mad-vyapāśrayo māṃ viśeṣato 'pakarṣeṇa sakāmatayāpi ya āśrayate so 'pi kiṃ punar niṣkāma-bhakta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1424: nitya-naimittika-kāmyāni putra-kalatrādi-poṣaṇa-lakṣaṇāni vyavahārikāṇy api sarvāṇi kurvāṇaḥ kiṃ punas
GE07bhg4c18u:1426: atrāśrayate samyag sevata iti āḍ-upasargena sevāyāḥ pradhānībhūtatvam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1433: nanu mahā-pralaye tat tad dhāma kathaṃ sthāsyati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1435: mahā-pralaye mad-dhāmnaḥ kim api na vyayati mad-atarkya-prabhāvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1436: nanu jñānī khalv anekair janmabhir aneka-tapa-ādi-kleśaiḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1437: sarva-viṣayendriyoparāmeṇaiva naiṣkarmye saty eva yat sāyujyaṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1438: tasya te nityaṃ dhāma sakarmakatve sakāmakatve 'pi
GE07bhg4c18u:1442: Baladeva: atha pariniṣṭhitānām āha sarveti sārdha-dvayābhyām |
GE07bhg4c18u:1443: mad-vyapāśrayo mad-ekāntī sarvāṇi sva-vihitāni karmāṇi yathā-yogaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1446: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ - sarvathāpi tatra vobhaya-liṅgāt (Vs 3.4.34) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1447: īdṛśaḥ sa mat-prasādān mad-atyanugrahāt śāśvataṃ nityam avyayam
GE07bhg4c18u:1454: cetasā mayi saṃnyasya samarpya mat-paraḥ aham eva paraḥ prāpyaḥ puruṣārtho yasya sa vyavasāyātmikayā buddhyā yogam upāśritya satataṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle 'pi
GE07bhg4c18u:1455: brahmārpaṇaṃ brahma-havir iti (Gītā 4.24) nyāyena mayy eva cittaṃ yasya tathābhūto bhava
GE07bhg4c18u:1456: Viśvanātha: nanu tarhi māṃ prati tvaṃ niścayena kim ājñāpayasi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1457: kim aham ananya-bhakto bhavāmi, kiṃ vānantarokta-lakṣaṇaḥ sakāma-bhakta eva |
GE07bhg4c18u:1465: ca mayi sannyasya samarpya, mat-paro 'ham eva paraḥ prāpyaḥ puruṣārtho yasya sa niṣkāma ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1466: yad uktaṃ pūrvam eva yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat |
GE07bhg4c18u:1467: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva mad-arpaṇam || iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1469: buddhi-yogaṃ vyavasāyātmikayā buddhyā yogaṃ satataṃ mac-cittaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1471: Baladeva: tādṛśatvād eva tvaṃ sarvāṇi sva-vihitāni karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c18u:1473: mad-eka-puruṣārtho mām eva buddhi-yogam upāśritya satataṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle mac-citto bhava |
GE07bhg4c18u:1474: etac ca tvāṃ prati prāg apy uktaṃ yat karoṣīty ādinā arpayitvaiva karmāṇi kuru, na tu kṛtvārpayeti
GE07bhg4c18u:1477: atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi ||58||
GE07bhg4c18u:1478: Śrīdhara: tato yad bhaviṣyati tac chṛṇu - mac-citta iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1480: mat-prasādāt sarvāṇy api durgāṇi dustarāṇi sāṃsārika-duḥkhāni tariṣyasi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1481: vipakṣe doṣam āha -- atha cet yadi punas tvam ahaṃkārān jñātṛtvābhimānāt mad uktam evaṃ na śroṣyasi tarhi vinaṅkṣyasi puruṣārthād bhraṣṭo bhaviṣyasi ||58||
GE07bhg4c18u:1482: Viśvanātha : tataḥ kim ata āha mac-citta iti ||58||
GE07bhg4c18u:1483: Baladeva : evaṃ mac-cittas tvaṃ mat-prasādād eva sarvāṇi durgāṇi dustarāṇi
GE07bhg4c18u:1487: apaneṣyami dāsyāmi cātmānam iti pariniṣṭhitānāṃ sādhana-sādhya-paddhatir
GE07bhg4c18u:1489: atha ced ahaṅkārāt kṛtyākṛtya-viṣayaka-jñānābhimānāt tvaṃ mad-uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1490: na śroṣyasi tarhi vinaṅkṣyasi svārthāt vibhraṣṭo bhaviṣyasi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1491: na hi kaścit prāṇināṃ kṛtyākṛtyor vijñātā praśāstā vā matto 'nyo vartate ||58||
GE07bhg4c18u:1493: yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase |
GE07bhg4c18u:1494: mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati ||59||
GE07bhg4c18u:1495: Śrīdhara: kāmaṃ vinaṅkṣyasi na tu bandhubhir yuddhaṃ kariṣyāmīti cet tatrāha yad ahaṃkāram iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1496: mad-uktam anādṛtya kevalam ahaṅkāram avalambya yuddhaṃ na kariṣyāmīti yan manyase tvam adhyavasyasi eṣa tava vyavasāyo mithyaiva asvatantratvāt tava |
GE07bhg4c18u:1497: tad evāha prakṛtis tvāṃ rajo-guṇa-rūpeṇa pariṇatā satī niyokṣyati pravartayiṣyatīti ||59||
GE07bhg4c18u:1498: Viśvanātha: nanu kṣatriyasya mama[*ENDNOTE] yuddham eva paro dharmas tatra bandhu-vadha-pāpād bhīta eva pravartituṃ necchāmīti tatra sa-tarjanam āha yad aham iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1501: yadā tu mahāvīrasya tava svābhāviko yuddhotsāho durvāra evodbhaviṣyati tadā yudhyamānaḥ svayam eva bhīṣmādīn gurūn haniṣyan mayā hasiṣyasa iti bhāvaḥ ||59||
GE07bhg4c18u:1502: Baladeva: yadyapi kṣatriyasya yuddham eva dharmas tathāpi
GE07bhg4c18u:1503: guru-viprādi-vadha-hetukāt pāpād bhītasya me na tatra pravṛttir iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1504: kṛtyākṛtya-vijñātṛtvābhimānam ahaṅkāram āśritya nāhaṃ yotsye iti yadi tvaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1505: manyase, tarhi tavaiṣa vyavasāyo niścayo mithyā niṣphalo bhāvī, prakṛtir
GE07bhg4c18u:1506: man-māyā rajo-guṇātmanā pariṇatā mad-vākyāvahelinaṃ tvāṃ gurv-ādi-vadhe
GE07bhg4c18u:1510: kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśopi tat ||60||
GE07bhg4c18u:1513: pūrva-janma-saṃskāras tasmāj jātena svīyena karmaṇā śauryādinā pūrvoktena
GE07bhg4c18u:1514: nibaddhaḥ yantritas tvaṃ mohāt yat karma yuddha-lakṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ necchasi avaśaḥ san tat karma kariṣyasy eva ||60||
GE07bhg4c18u:1515: Viśvanātha: uktam evārthaṃ vivṛṇoti svabhāvaḥ kṣatriyatve hetuḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1516: pūrva-saṃskāras tasmāj jātena svīyena karmaṇā nibaddho yantritaḥ ||60||
GE07bhg4c18u:1519: api yuddhaṃ kartuṃ necchasi, tadā svabhāvajena svena karmaṇā śauryeṇa man-māyodbhāsitena nibaddho 'vaśas tat kariṣyasi ||60||
GE07bhg4c18u:1523: Śrīdhara: tad evaṃ śloka-dvayena sāṅkhyādi-mate prakṛti-pāratantryaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1525: idānīṃ svamatam āha īśvara iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c18u:1527: kiṃ kurvan, sarvāṇi bhūtāni māyayā nija-śaktyā bhrāmayaṃs tat-tat-karmasu pravartayan, yathā
GE07bhg4c18u:1528: dāru-yantram ārūḍhāni kṛtrimāni bhūtāni sūtradhāro loke bhrāmayati tadvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1529: yad vā yantrāṇi śarīrāṇi ārūḍhāni bhūtāni dehābhimānino jīvān bhramayann ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1531: eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1532: karmādhyakṣaḥ sarvabhūtādhivāsaḥ sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaś ca || iti || (ŚvetU 6.11)
GE07bhg4c18u:1533: antaryāmi-brāhmaṇaṃ[*ENDNOTE] ca -- ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmānam antaro yamayati yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram eva te ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c18u:1535: Viśvanātha: śloka-dvayena svabhāva-vādināṃ matam uktvā sva-matam āha īśvaro nārāyaṇaḥ sarvāntaryāmī
GE07bhg4c18u:1537: yaṃ pṛthivī na veda, yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ, yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati
GE07bhg4c18u:1543: ity ādi śruti-pratipādita īśvaro 'ntaryāmī hṛdi tiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1545: sarvāṇi bhūtāni māyayā nija-śaktyā bhrāmayan bhramayan[*ENDNOTE] tat-tat-karmāṇi
GE07bhg4c18u:1546: pravartayan, yathā sūtra-sañcārādi-yantram ārūḍhāni kṛtrimāṇi pāñcālikā-rūpāṇi sarva-bhūtāni māyā vibhramayati tadvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1547: yad vā yantrārūḍhāni śarīrārūḍhān sarva-jīvān ity arthaḥ ||61||
GE07bhg4c18u:1550: he arjuna tvaṃ cet svaṃ vijṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1551: manyase, tarhy antaryāmi-brāhmaṇāt tvayā jñāto ya īśvaraḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1552: brahmādi-sthāvarāntānāṃ hṛddeśe tiṣṭhati māyayā sva-śaktyā tāni bhrāmayan san |
GE07bhg4c18u:1556: rūpakeṇopamātra vyajyate - yathā sūtra-dhāro dāru-yantrārūḍhāni kṛtrimāṇi bhūtāni bhrāmayati
GE07bhg4c18u:1558: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata |
GE07bhg4c18u:1559: tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam ||62||
GE07bhg4c18u:1561: yasmād evaṃ sarve jīvāḥ parameśvara-paratantrāḥ tasmād ahaṅkāraṃ parityajya sarva-bhāvena sarvātmanā tam īśvaram eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha |
GE07bhg4c18u:1562: tataś ca tasyaiva prasādāt parāṃ uttamāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ ca pārameśvaraṃ śāśvataṃ nityaṃ prāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c18u:1572: mad-iṣṭa-devaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ sa eva mad-gurur māṃ bhakti-yogam anukūlaṃ hitaṃ copadeśam upadiśati ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:1573: tam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye ity aniśaṃ bhāvayeti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1575: naivopayanty apacitiṃ kavayas taveśa brahmayusāpi kṛtam ṛddha-mudaḥ smarantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1576: yo 'ntar-bahis tanu-bhṛtām aśubhaṃ vidhunvan ācārya-caittya-vapuṣā sva-gatiṃ vyanakti || (BhP 11.29.6) iti ||62||
GE07bhg4c18u:1577: Baladeva: tarhi tam eveśvaraṃ sarva-bhāvena kāyādi-vyāpāreṇa śaraṇaṃ gaccha |
GE07bhg4c18u:1578: tataḥ kim iti cet tatrāha tad iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1580: śāśvataṃ nityaṃ sthānaṃ ca, tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam ity ādi śruti-gītaṃ tad dhāma prāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c18u:1582: eva tvat-sakhaḥ sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ ity (Gītā 15.15) ādi
GE07bhg4c18u:1583: mat-pūrvokter deva-rṣy-ādi-sammati-grāhiṇā tvayāpi paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma (Gītā 10.12) ity-ādinā svīkṛtatvāc ca |
GE07bhg4c18u:1588: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1591: ity anena prakāreṇa te tubhyaṃ sarvajñena parama-kāruṇikena mayā jñānam ākhyātam upadiṣṭam
GE07bhg4c18u:1594: etan mayopadiṣṭaṃ gītā-śāstram aśeṣato paryālocya paścād yathecchasi tathā kuru |
GE07bhg4c18u:1595: etasmin paryālocite sati tava moho nivartiṣyata iti bhāvaḥ ||63||
GE07bhg4c18u:1597: karma-yogasyāṣṭāṅga-yogasya jñāna-yogasya ca jñānaṃ jñāyate 'neneti jñānaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1598: jñāna-śāstraṃ guhyād guhyataram ity atirahasyatvāt kair api
GE07bhg4c18u:1601: yad vā, teṣāṃ sārvajñyam āpekṣikaṃ mama tu ātyantikam ity atas te tu etad atiguhyatvān na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1602: mayāpi atiguhyatvād eva te sarvathaiva naitad upadiṣṭā iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1603: etad aśeṣeṇa niḥśeṣataḥ eva vimṛśya, yathā yena prakāreṇa svābhirucitaṃ,
GE07bhg4c18u:1604: yat[*ENDNOTE] kartum icchasi tathā tat kuru, ity antyaṃ jñāna-ṣaṭkaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1615: man-manā bhava ity ādi padya-dvayī catuḥ-ṣaṣṭhy-akṣarā śuddhā bhavatīti budhyate ||63||
GE07bhg4c18u:1618: gītā-śāstram jñāyante karma-bhakti-jñānāny anena iti nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1628: sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1629: iṣṭosi me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam ||64||
GE07bhg4c18u:1630: Śrīdhara: ati-gambhīraṃ gītā-śāstram aśeṣataḥ paryālocayitum aśaknuvataḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1631: kṛpayā svayam eva tasya sāraṃ saṅgṛhya kathayati sarva-guhyatamam iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1632: sarvebhyo 'pu guhyebhyo guhyatamaṃ me vacas tatra tatroktam api bhūyaḥ punar api vakṣyamaṇaṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c18u:1633: punaḥ punaḥ kathane hetum āha dṛḍham atyantaṃ me mama tvam iṣṭaḥ priyo 'sīti matvā tata eva hetos te hitaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1635: yad vā tvaṃ mameṣṭo 'si mayā vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca dṛḍhaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1636: sarva-pramāṇopetam iti niścitya tatas te vakṣyāmīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1639: Viśvanātha: tataś ca atigambhīrārthaṃ gītā-śāstraṃ paryālocayitum pravartamānaṃ tuṣṇīmbhūyaiva sthitaṃ sva-priya-sakham arjunam ālakṣya kṛpā-dravac-citta-nava-nīto bhagavān bhoḥ priyavayasya arjuna
GE07bhg4c18u:1645: mām evaiṣyasi yuktvaivam ātmānaṃ mat-parāyaṇaḥ || (Gītā 9.34) iti yat tad eva paramaṃ sarva-śāstrārtha-sārasya gītā-śāstrasyāpi sāraṃ guhyatamam iti nātaḥ paraṃ kiñcana guhyam asti kvacit kutaścit katham api
GE07bhg4c18u:1648: iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham atiśayena eva priyo me sakhā bhavasīti tata eva hetor hitaṃ te iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1649: sakhāyaṃ vinātirahasyaṃ na kam api kaścid api brūta iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1651: Baladeva: atha nirapekṣāṇāṃ sādhana-sādhya-paddhatim upadeksyann ādau tāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1653: sarveṣu guhyeṣu madhye 'tiśayitaṃ guhyam iti sarva-guhyatamam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1654: bhūya iti rāja-vidyādhyāye man-manā bhava ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c18u:1655: pūrvam api mamātipriyatvād ante punar ucyamānaṃ śṛṇu paramaṃ sarva-sārasyāpi gītā-śāstrasya sārabhūtam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1660: nikhila-pramāṇopetam iti niścinoṣy atas te hitaṃ vakṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1663: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru |
GE07bhg4c18u:1664: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyosi me ||65||
GE07bhg4c18u:1665: Śrīdhara: tad evam āha man-manā iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1669: mām eva namaskuru evaṃ vartamānas tvaṃ mat-prasādāt labdha-jñānena mām evaiṣyasi prāpsyasi
GE07bhg4c18u:1672: atha satyaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ tubhyam ahaṃ pratijāne pratijñāṃ karomi
GE07bhg4c18u:1673: Viśvanātha: manmanā bhava iti mad-bhaktaḥ sann eva māṃ cintaya |
GE07bhg4c18u:1674: na tu jñānī yogī vā bhūtvā mad-dhyānaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1675: yad vā man-manā bhava mahyaṃ śyāmasundarāya
GE07bhg4c18u:1677: svīyaṃ deyatvena mano yasya tathābhūto bhava |
GE07bhg4c18u:1678: athavā śrotrādīndriyāṇi dehīty āha mad-bhakto bhava |
GE07bhg4c18u:1681: athavā mahyaṃ gandha-puṣpa-dhūpa-dīpa-naivedyāni dehīty āha mad-yājī bhava |
GE07bhg4c18u:1684: athavā mahyaṃ namaskāra-mātraṃ dehīty āha māṃ namaskuru bhūmau nipatya aṣṭāṅgaṃ vā praṇāmaṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c18u:1685: eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mac-cintana-sevana-pūjana-praṇāmāṇāṃ samuccayam ekataraṃ vā tvaṃ kuru |
GE07bhg4c18u:1688: tubhyam aham ātmānam eva dāsyāmīti satyaṃ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1693: nanu māthura-deśodbhūtā lokāḥ prativākyam eva śapathaṃ kurvanti satyaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1695: tvaṃ me priyo 'si nahi priyaṃ ko
GE07bhg4c18u:1701: na tu mama rūpāntaraṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvādi-lakṣaṇam aṅguṣṭha-mātram antaryāmiṇaṃ vā nṛsiṃha-varāhādi-lakṣaṇaṃ vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1703: tvat-sakhaṃ dāsyāmīti te tava satyaṃ śapathaḥ satyaṃ śapatha-tathyayoḥ iti nānārthavargaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1705: nanu māthuratvāt tava śapatha-karaṇād api me na saṃśaya-vināśas tatrāha pratijāne pratijñāṃ kṛtvāham abruvam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1707: snigdha-manasā hi māthurāḥ priyaṃ na pratārayanti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1709: yasya mayy atiprītas tasmin mamāpi tathā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1710: tad-viyogaṃ soḍhum ahaṃ na śaknomīti pūrvam eva mayoktaṃ priyo hi ityādinā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1714: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja |
GE07bhg4c18u:1715: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣyayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ ||66||
GE07bhg4c18u:1717: mad-bhaktyaiva sarvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti dṛḍha-viśvāsena vidhi-kaiṅkaryaṃ tyaktvā mad-eka-śaraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1719: evaṃ vartamānaḥ karma-tyāga-nimittaṃ pāpaṃ syād iti mā śucaḥ mokṣaṃ mā kārṣīḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1722: Viśvanātha: nanu tad-dhyānādikaṃ yat karomi tat kiṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1723: svāśrama-dharmānuṣṭhāna-pūrvakaṃ vā, kevalaṃ vā ? tatrāha sarva-dharmān
GE07bhg4c18u:1724: varṇāśrama-dharmān sarvān eva parityajya ekaṃ mām eva śaraṇaṃ vraja |
GE07bhg4c18u:1725: parityajya sannyasyeti na vyākhyeyam arjunasya kṣatriyatvena sannyāsādhikārāt na cārjunaṃ lakṣīkṛtyānya-jana-samudāyam evopadideśa bhagavān iti vācyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1726: lakṣyabhūtam arjunaṃ prati upadeśaṃ yojayitum aucitye saty evānyasyāpi upadeṣṭavyatvaṃ sambhaven na, tv anyathā na ca parityjyety asya phala-tyāga eva tātparyam iti vyākhyeyam asya vākyasya devarṣi-bhūtāpta-nṝṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ nāyaṃ kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan |
GE07bhg4c18u:1727: sarvātmanā yaḥ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ gato mukundaṃ parihṛtya kartam || (BhP 11.5.41)
GE07bhg4c18u:1730: tadāmṛtatvaṃ pratipadyamāno mayātma-bhūyāya ca kalpate vai || (BhP 11.29.32)
GE07bhg4c18u:1731: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1732: mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate || (BhP 11.20.9)
GE07bhg4c18u:1733: ājñāyaiva guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān |
GE07bhg4c18u:1734: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ || (BhP 11.11.37)
GE07bhg4c18u:1737: ata ekaṃ māṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja, na tu dharma-jñāna-yoga-devatāntarādikam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1739: sarva-śreṣṭhāyāṃ tavādhikāro nāstīty atas tvaṃ yat karoṣi yad
GE07bhg4c18u:1740: aśnāsītyādi-bruvāṇena mayā karma-miśrāyāṃ bhaktau tavādhikāra uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1741: samprati tv atikṛpayā tubhyam ananya-bhaktau evādhikāras tasyā ananya-bhakter yādṛcchika-mad-aikāntika-bhakta-kṛpaika-labhyatva-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1742: niyamaṃ sva-kṛtam api bhīṣma-yuddhe sva-pratijñām ivāpanīya datta iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1747: ādiṣṭam adhunā tu svarūpeṇaiva tat-tyāga ādiśyate ity ataḥ kathaṃ te nitya-karmākaraṇe pāpāni sambhavanti ? pratyuta ataḥ paraṃ nitya-karmaṇi
GE07bhg4c18u:1748: kṛta eva pāpāni bhaviṣyanti sākṣān mad-ājñā-laṅghanād ity avadheyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1749: nanu yo hi yac-charaṇo bhavati, sa hi mūlya-krītaḥ paśur iva tad-adhīnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1750: sa taṃ yat kārayati, tad eva karoti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1752: yad bhojayati, tad eva bhuṅkte iti śaraṇāpatti-lakṣaṇasya dharmasya tattvam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1759: goptṛtve iti sa eva mama rakṣako nānya iti yat
GE07bhg4c18u:1763: svīya-sthūla-sūkṣma-deha-sahitasya eva svasya śrī-kṛṣṇārtha eva viniyogaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1764: akārpaṇyaṃ nānyatra kvāpi sva-dainya-jñāpanam iti ṣaṇṇāṃ vastūnāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1766: tad adyārabhya yady ahaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gata eva varte tarhi tva-uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1767: bhadram abhadraṃ vā yad bhavet tad eva mama kartavyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1768: tatra yadi tvaṃ māṃ dharmam eva kārayasi tadā na kācic cintā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1769: yadi tv īśvaratvāt svairācāras tvaṃ mām adharmam eva kārayasi, tadā kā gatis tatrāha aham
GE07bhg4c18u:1770: | prācīnārvācīnāni yāvanti vartante yāvanti vā ahaṃ kārayiṣyāmi tebhyaḥ sarvebhya eva pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1771: nāham anya-śaraṇya iva tatrāsamartha iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1772: tvām alambyaiva śāstram idaṃ loka-mātram evopadiṣṭavān asmi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1773: mā śucaḥ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ vā śokaṃ mā kārṣīḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1775: sva-para-dharmān sarvān eva parityajya mac-cintanādi-paro māṃ śaraṇam āpadya sukhenaiva vartatām |
GE07bhg4c18u:1778: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate |
GE07bhg4c18u:1779: teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy aham || (Gītā 9.22) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1780: hanta etāvān bhāro mayā sva-prabhau nikṣipta ity api śokaṃ mākārṣīr bhakta-vatsalasya mama na tatrāyāsa-leśo 'pīti nātaḥ param adhikam
GE07bhg4c18u:1782: Baladeva: nanu yajana-praṇaty-ādis tava śuddhā bhaktiḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1783: prāktana-karma-rūpānanta-pāpa-malina-hṛdā puṃsā kathaḥ śakyā kartuṃ yāvat tvad-bhakti-virodhīni tāny anantāni pāpāni kṛcchrādi-prāyaścittaiḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1784: savihitaiś ca dharmair na vinaśyeyur iti cet tatrāha - sarveti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1785: prāktana-pāpa-prāyaścitta-bhūtān kṛcchrādīn sa-vihitāṃś ca sarvān dharmān
GE07bhg4c18u:1786: parityajya svarūpatas tyaktvā māṃ sarveśvaraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1788: santam avidyā-paryanta-sarva-kāma-vināśam ekaṃ, na tu matto 'nyaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1795: icchatāticira-sādhyā duṣkarāś ca te kṛcchrādayaḥ katham anuṣṭheyā iti śokaṃ mā kārṣīr ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1796: atra mat-prapattur na bhaved ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1797: śrutiś caivam āha - na karmaṇā na
GE07bhg4c18u:1801: hṛd-viśuddhaye pariniṣṭhitānāṃ ca loka-saṅgrahāya yathāyathaṃ kāryās te
GE07bhg4c18u:1803: tam etam ity ādibhyaḥ satyena labhyas tapasā hy eṣa ātmā ity ādibhyaś ca śrutibhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1804: na ca vihita-tyāge pratyavāya-lakṣaṇaṃ pāpaṃ syād iti śokaṃ mā kurv iti vyākhyeyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1813: na ca na hi kvacit ity ādi nyāyena svadharmānuṣṭhānāpattis tad-yajanādi-niratasya tena nyāyena
GE07bhg4c18u:1814: | tathā ca sanniṣṭhasyātmānubhavāntaḥpariniṣṭhitasya ca parātmānubhavānto yathā dharmācāras tathā prapattuḥ śuddhāntaḥ sa iti evam evoktam ekādaśe -
GE07bhg4c18u:1815: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1816: mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate || (BhP 11.20.9) iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1831: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yobhyasūyati ||67||
