GE07bhg4c18u:1832: Śrīdhara: evaṃ gītārtha-tattvam upadiśya tat-sampradāya-pravartane niyamam āha idam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1835: na ca abhaktāya gurāv īśvare ca
GE07bhg4c18u:1836: bhakti-śūnyāya kadācid api na vācyaṃ na cāśuśrūṣave paricaryām akurvate vācyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1837: māṃ parameśvaraṃ yo 'bhyasūyati manuṣya-dṛṣṭyā doṣāropeṇa nindati tasmai na ca vācyam ||67||
GE07bhg4c18u:1838: Viśvanātha: evaṃ gītā-śāstram upadiśya sampradāya-pravartane niyamam āha idam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1839: atapaskāya asaṃyatendriyāya manaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ iti smṛteḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1840: saṃyatendriye saty api abhaktāya na vācyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1844: Baladeva: atha svopadiṣṭaṃ gītā-śāstraṃ pātrebhyaḥ eva na tv apātrebhyo deyam iti upadiśati idam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1845: idaṃ śāstraṃ te tvayātapaskāya ajitendriyāya na vācyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1847: śāstra-pratipādye mayi ca sarveśa-bhakti-śūnyāya na vācyam |
GE07bhg4c18u:1852: tasmai tu naiva vācyam ity ato bhinnayā vibhaktyā tasya nirdeśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1853: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ anāviṣkurvann anvayāt iti (Vs 3.4.50) ||67||
GE07bhg4c18u:1855: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1856: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ ||68||
GE07bhg4c18u:1857: Śrīdhara: etair doṣair virahitebhyo gītā-śāstropadeṣṭuḥ phalam āha ya iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1859: sa mayi parāṃ bhaktiṃ karoti tato niḥsaṃśayaḥ san mām eva prāpnotīty arthaḥ ||68||
GE07bhg4c18u:1860: Viśvanātha: etad upadeṣṭuḥ phalam āha ya iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c18u:1864: Baladeva: śāstropadeṣṭuḥ phalam āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1868: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaścin me priyakṛttamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1869: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi ||69||
GE07bhg4c18u:1872: sakāśād anyo manuṣyeṣu madhye kaścid api mama priya-kṛttamo 'tyantaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1874: na ca kālāntare bhavitā bhaviṣyati mamāpi tasmād anyaḥ priyataro 'dhunā bhuvi tāvan nāsti
GE07bhg4c18u:1877: Viśvanātha: tasmād upadeṣṭuḥ sakāśāt anyo 'tipriyaṅkaro 'tipriyaś ca nāsti ||69||
GE07bhg4c18u:1879: tasmād gītopadeṣṭuḥ sakāśād anyo manuṣyeṣu madhye mama
GE07bhg4c18u:1880: priya-kṛttamaḥ paritoṣa-kartā pūrvaṃ nābhūn na ca bhaviṣyati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1881: mama tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi nābhūn na ca bhaviṣyati ||69||
GE07bhg4c18u:1883: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1884: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ ||70||
GE07bhg4c18u:1885: Śrīdhara : paṭhataḥ phalam āha adhyeṣyata iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1887: imaṃ dharmyaṃ dharmād anapetaṃ saṃvādaṃ yo 'dhyeṣyate japa-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c18u:1888: paṭhiṣyati tena puṃsā sarva-yajñebhyaḥ śreṣṭhena jñāna-yajñena aham iṣṭaḥ syāṃ bhaveyam iti me matiḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1889: yady apy asau gītārtham abudhyamāna eva kevalaṃ japati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1890: tathāpi mama tac chṛṇvato mām evāsau prakāśayatīti buddhir bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1891: yathā loke yaṛcchayāpi yadā kaścit kadācit kasyacit nāma gṛhṇāti tadāsau mām evāyam āhavayatīti matvā tat-pārśvam āgacchati |
GE07bhg4c18u:1896: tathaiva asyāpi prasanno bhaveyam iti bhāvaḥ ||70||
GE07bhg4c18u:1897: Viśvanātha : etad adhayana-phalam āha adhyeṣyata iti ||70||
GE07bhg4c18u:1898: Baladeva : atha śāstrādhyetuḥ phalam āha adhyeṣyate ceti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1899: atra yo jñāna-yajño varṇitas tenāham etat-pāṭha-mātreṇaiveṣṭo 'bhyarcitaḥ syām iti me matirs tasyāhaṃ sulabha ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1901: śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1902: sopi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām ||71||
GE07bhg4c18u:1903: Śrīdhara : anyasya japato yo 'nyaḥ kaścit śṛṇoti tasyāpi phalam āha śraddhāvān iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1904: yo naraḥ śraddhā-yuktaḥ kevalaṃ śṛṇuyād api śraddhāvān api yaḥ kaścit kim artham uccair japati abaddhaḥ vā japatīti vā
GE07bhg4c18u:1905: doṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ karoti tad-vyāvṛtty-artham āha anasūyaś cāsūya-rahito yaḥ śṛṇuyāt so 'pi sarvaiḥ pāpair muktaḥ sann aśvamedhādi-puṇya-kṛtāṃ lokān prāpnuyāt ||71||
GE07bhg4c18u:1908: yaḥ kevalaṃ śraddhayā śṛṇoti anasūyaḥ kim artham uccair aśuddhaṃ vā paṭhatīti doṣa-dṛṣṭim akurvan so 'pi nikhilaiḥ pāpair muktaḥ puṇya-karmaṇām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān prāpnuyāt yad vā puṇya-karmaṇāṃ bhaktimatāṃ lokān dhruva-lokādīn
GE07bhg4c18u:1911: kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1913: Śrīdhara : samyag bodhānupapattau punar upadekṣyāmīty āśayenāha kaccid iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1918: Viśvanātha : samyag bodhānupapattau punar upadekṣyāmīty āśayenāha kaccid
GE07bhg4c18u:1924: samyag-anubhavānudaye punar apy etad upadekṣyāmīti bhāvaḥ ||72||
GE07bhg4c18u:1926: arjuna uvāca naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta |
GE07bhg4c18u:1928: Śrīdhara : kṛtārthaḥ sann arjuna uvāca naṣṭa iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1929: ātma-viṣaye moho naṣṭaḥ yato 'yam aham asmīti svarūpānusandhāna-rūpā smṛtis tvat-prasādān mayā labdhā |
GE07bhg4c18u:1931: sandeho yasya so 'haṃ tava ājñāṃ kariṣye iti ||73||
GE07bhg4c18u:1932: Viśvanātha : kim ataḥ paraṃ pṛcchāmy ahaṃ tu sarva-dharmān parityajya tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gato niścinta eva tvayi viśrambhavān asmīty āha naṣṭa iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1933: kariṣya ity ataḥ paraṃ śaraṇasya tavājñāyāṃ sthitir eva śaraṇāpannasya mama dharmaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1934: na tu svāśrama-dharmo na tu jñāna-yogādaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1936: tataś ca bhoḥ priyasakha arjuna mama
GE07bhg4c18u:1939: cikīrṣāmīti bhagavatokte gati gāṇḍīva-pāṇir arjuno yoddhum udatiṣṭhād iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1940: Baladeva : evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pārthaḥ śāstrānubhavaṃ phala-dvāreṇāha naṣṭa iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1941: moho viparīta-jñāna-lakṣaṇaḥ mama naṣṭas tvat-prasādād eva smṛtiś ca
GE07bhg4c18u:1946: etad uktaṃ bhavati - deva-mānavādayo nikhilāḥ prāṇinaḥ sarve sva-sva-karmasu
GE07bhg4c18u:1949: sa hi nirguṇo nirākṛtir udāsīnas tat-sannidhānāt
GE07bhg4c18u:1950: prakṛtir jagad-dhetur ity evaṃ viparīta-jñāna-lakṣaṇo yo mohaḥ pūrvaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1960: ataḥ paraṃ tvām ahaṃ prapannaḥ sthito 'smi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1961: tvaṃ māṃ kadācid api na tyakṣyasīti sandehaś ca me chinnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1962: atha bhūbhāra-haraṇaṃ sva-prayojanaṃ cet prapannena mayā
GE07bhg4c18u:1963: cikīrṣitaṃ tarhi tad-vacanaṃ tava kariṣyāmīty arjuno dhanuḥ-pāṇir
GE07bhg4c18u:1966: sañjaya uvāca ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1968: Śrīdhara : tad evaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati śrī-kṛṣṇārjuna-saṃvādaṃ kathayitvā prastutāṃ kathām anusandadhānaḥ sañjaya uvāca itīti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1974: patra-dvayīṃ vināyakaḥ sva-vāhanenādhunā hṛtavān ity ataḥ punar nālikham |
GE07bhg4c18u:1978: śrīmad-bhagavad-gītā-ṭīkā sārārtha-darśinī samāptī-bhūtā satāṃ prītaye 'stād iti sārārthavarṣiṇī viśva-janīnā bhakta-cātakān |
GE07bhg4c18u:1979: mādhurī dhinutād asyā mādhurī bhātu me hṛdi ||
GE07bhg4c18u:1984: atha kathā-sambandham anusandadhānaḥ sañjayo dhṛtarāṣṭram uvāca ity aham iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1989: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param |
GE07bhg4c18u:1990: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam ||75||
GE07bhg4c18u:1991: Śrīdhara : ātmanas tac-chravaṇe sambhāvanām āha vyāsa-prasādād iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:1992: bhagavatā vyāsena divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotrādi machyaṃ dattam ato vyāsasya prasādāt etat ahaṃ śrutavān asmi |
GE07bhg4c18u:1993: kiṃ tad ity apekṣāyām āha paraṃ yogaṃ |
GE07bhg4c18u:1994: paratvaṃ āviṣkaroti yogeśvarāt śrī-kṛṣṇāt svayam eva sākṣāt kathayataḥ śrutavān iti ||75||
GE07bhg4c18u:1997: kim etad ity āha param yogam iti |
GE07bhg4c18u:2002: teṣām adhīśān niyantuḥ svayaṃ-rūpāt kṛṣṇāt sva-mukhenaiva, na tu paramparayā kathayataḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:2005: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam |
GE07bhg4c18u:2006: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ ||76||
GE07bhg4c18u:2008: hṛṣyāmi romāñcito bhavāmi harṣaṃ prāpnomīti vā |
GE07bhg4c18u:2014: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:2015: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ ||77||
GE07bhg4c18u:2019: Baladeva : tac ca viśva-rūpaṃ yad arjunāyopadiṣṭam ||77||
GE07bhg4c18u:2021: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:2022: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama ||78||
GE07bhg4c18u:2023: Śrīdhara : atas tvaṃ putrāṇāṃ rājyādi-śaṅkā parityajety āśayenāha yatreti
GE07bhg4c18u:2024: | yatra yeṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ pakṣe yogeśvaraḥ śrī-kṛṣṇo vartate, yatra ca pārthaḥ gāṇḍīva-dhanur-dharas tatraiva ca śrī rāja-lakṣmīs tatraiva niściteti sambadhyate iti mama matir niścayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:2025: ata idānīm api tāvat saputras tvaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ śaraṇam upetya pāṇḍavān prasādya sarvaṃ ca tebhyo nivedya putra-prāṇa-rakṣāṃ kuru iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c18u:2030: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā |
GE07bhg4c18u:2032: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakyas tv aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna |
GE07bhg4c18u:2034: ity ādau bhagavad-bhakter mokṣaṃ prati sādhakatamatva-śravaṇāt
GE07bhg4c18u:2040: dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te || (Gītā 10.10)
GE07bhg4c18u:2042: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api || (Gītā 13.19)
GE07bhg4c18u:2043: na ca jñānam eva bhaktir iti yuktam |
GE07bhg4c18u:2046: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ || (Gītā 18.55) ity ādau bheda-darśanāt |
GE07bhg4c18u:2047: na caivaṃ sati tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya iti śruti-virodhaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:2049: na hi kāṣṭhaiḥ pacati ity ukte jvālānām asādhyanatvam uktaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c18u:2050: kiṃ ca yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau |
GE07bhg4c18u:2051: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ || (ŚvetU 6.23)
GE07bhg4c18u:2052: dehānte devaḥ paraṃ brahma tārakaṃ vyacaṣṭe |
GE07bhg4c18u:2053: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya ity ādi-śruti-smṛti-purāṇa-vacanāny evaṃ sati samañjasāni bhavanti
GE07bhg4c18u:2054: tasmāt bhagavad-bhaktir eva mokṣa-hetur iti siddham ||
GE07bhg4c18u:2056: sa eva paramānandas tayā prīṇātu mādhavaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c18u:2060: tattvaṃ prepsur upaiti kiṃ guru-kṛpā-pīyūṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ vinā |
GE07bhg4c18u:2061: ambu svāñjalinā nirasya jaladher āditsur antarmaṇī nāvarteṣu na kiṃ nimajjati janaḥ sat-karṇa-dhāraṃ vinā ||
GE07bhg4c18u:2064: Baladeva: evaṃ ca sati sva-putra-vijayādi-spṛhāṃ parityajety āha yatreti |
GE07bhg4c18u:2068: yatra pārthas tvat-pitṛ-svasṛ-putro narāvatāraḥ kṛṣṇaikāntī dhanurdharo
GE07bhg4c18u:2078: tan na - man-manā bhava mad-bhakta ity ādeḥ,
GE07bhg4c18u:2079: sarva-dharmān parityajya ity ādeś copadeśas tasmāc catūrṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmā hṛd-viśuddhi-hetutayā loka-saṅgrahārthatayā ceha nirūpitā ity eva suṣṭhu ||78||
GE07bhg4c18u:2081: kṣipraṃ prasādanī viṣṇor ity aṣṭādaśato matam ||
GE07bhg4c18u:2083: sphītaṃ sad-guṇa-vṛndais tad atra gītaṃ paraṃ tattvam ||
GE07bhg4c18u:2084: yad icchā-tariṃ prāpya gītāpayodhau nyamajjaṃ gṛhītāti-citrārtha-ratnam |
